item.title: #2075 - Protect Our Parks 10 (Part 2) | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Shane Gillis, Mark Normand, and Ari Shaffir are stand-up comics, writers, and podcasters. Shane is the co-host of “Matt and Shane’s Secret Podcast” with Matt McCusker and one half of the sketch comedy duo “Gilly and Keeves” with John McKeever. Watch his stand-up special “Beautiful Dogs” on Netflix, and catch him as “Gilly” on Peacock’s “Bupkis.” www.shanemgillis.comMark is the co-host of the podcasts “Tuesdays with Stories” with Joe List and “We Might Be Drunk” with Sam Morril.

item.description: Podcast Description Derek is the fitness educator and entrepreneur behind the “More Plates, More Dates” YouTube channel, podcast and companion website. https://moreplatesmoredates.com Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe sits down with Daniel Cormier, a two-division UFC world champion, Hall Of Fame fighter, and combat sports commentator. https://www.youtube.com/@DC_MMA Transcript

item.title: #2072 - Stavros Halkias | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Stavros Halkias is a stand-up comic and host of the podcast “Stavvy’s World.” Catch his new Netflix comedy special “Fat Rascal” on December 5, 2023. https://www.stavvy.biz Transcript

item.title: #2071 - Kim Congdon & Sara Weinshenk | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Kim Congdon and Sara Weinshenk are stand-up comedians. They are co-hosts of the “This Bitch” podcast, and hosts of individual podcasts: “The Kim Congdon Takeover” and “Shenk.“https://linktr.ee/Kimcongdonhttps://linktr.ee/saraweinshenk Transcript

item.title: #2070 - Evan Hafer | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Evan Hafer is a Special Forces veteran, founder/CEO of Black Rifle Coffee Company, and one of the hosts of the “Black Rifle Coffee Podcast.“https://www.blackriflecoffee.com Transcript

item.title: #2069 - Dr. Shawn Baker | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Shawn Baker is a physician, athlete, author of “The Carnivore Diet,” host of “The Dr. Shawn Baker Podcast,” and co-founder of online medical clinic Revero. https://carnivore.diet/shawn-baker-links/ Transcript

item.title: #2068 - Cameron Hanes | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Cameron Hanes is a master bowhunter, outdoorsman, elite athlete, author, and host of the podcast “Keep Hammering with Cameron Hanes.” www.cameronhanes.com Transcript

item.title: #2067 - Dave Smith | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dave Smith is a stand-up comedian, libertarian political commentator, and podcaster. He’s the host of the “Part of the Problem” podcast, as well as a co-host of the “Legion of Skanks” podcast.www.comicdavesmith.com Transcript

item.title: #2066 - Ralph Barbosa | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ralph Barbosa is a stand-up comic. His new comedy special, “Ralph Barbosa: Cowabunga,” is available to stream on Netflix. www.barbosacomedy.com Transcript

item.title: #2065 - David Grusch | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description David Grusch is a former Air Force intelligence officer, representative of the National Reconnaissance Office to the Unidentified Aerial Phenomena Task Force, and co-lead for Unidentified Aerial Phenomena analysis at the National Geo-Spacial Intelligence Agency. Transcript

item.title: #2064 - Mike Baker | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Mike Baker is a former CIA covert operations officer and current CEO of Portman Square Group, a global intelligence firm. He’s also the host of “Black Files Declassified” on Discovery+ and the Science Channel, author of “Company Rules, Or Everything I Know About Business I Learned from the CIA,” and host of “The President’s Daily Brief” podcast. http://www.portmansquaregroup.com/https://www.thefirsttv.com/pdb/ Transcript

item.title: #2063 - The Rock | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson is an actor, producer, entrepreneur, and retired professional wrestler. https://therock.komi.io Transcript

item.title: #2062 - Will & Jenni Harris | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Will Harris is the owner of White Oak Pastures: a family farm utilizing regenerative agriculture and humane animal husbandry practices. Jenni Harris, his daughter, is the marketing manager of White Oak Pastures. Will’s new book “A Bold Return to Giving a Damn: One Farm, Six Generations, and the Future of Food” is available now. www.whiteoakpastures.com Transcript

item.title: #2061 - Whitney Cummings | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Whitney Cummings is a stand-up comic, actor, author, and host of the podcast “Good for You.” Her new comedy special “Mouthy,” will have its exclusive premiere via OFTV on Nov. 15, 2023.https://whitneycummings.com Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Gary Brecka is a human biologist and co-founder of 10X Health System.https://www.garybrecka.com https://www.theultimatehuman.com/https://www.instagram.com/garybrecka/ Transcript

item.title: #2059 - Adam Greentree | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Adam Greentree is an Australian bowhunter, photographer, and outdoorsman.https://www.instagram.com/adam.greentree Transcript

item.title: #2058 - Elliott West | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Elliott West is a historian, author, and professor specializing in the history of the American West. Look for his book “Continental Reckoning: The American West in the Age of Expansion” available now.https://history.uark.edu/directory/faculty.php?uid=ewest Transcript

item.title: #2057 - Dale Brisby | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dale Brisby is a cowboy, bullrider, rancher, YouTuber, and the star of Netflix’s “How to Be a Cowboy.” www.rodeotime.com https://www.youtube.com/@DaleBrisbyBullRider Transcript

item.title: #2056 - David Blaine | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description David Blaine is an illusionist, endurance artist, and extreme performer. His new residency, “Impossible,” is scheduled to begin at Encore Theater at Wynn Las Vegas on New Years Eve weekend. www.davidblaine.com Transcript

item.title: #2055 - Tim Kennedy | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tim Kennedy is a Green Beret, retired UFC fighter, founder of Sheepdog Response, and co-founder of Save our Allies: an organization dedicated to rescuing and relocating Americans and allies in war-torn environments. www.timkennedy.com Transcript

item.title: #2054 - Elon Musk | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Elon Musk is a business magnate, designer, and engineer. His portfolio of businesses include Tesla, Inc., SpaceX, Neuralink, X, and many others.https://twitter.com/elonmusk Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Danny and Michael Philippou are the directors of the horror film “Talk to Me,” available now on streaming platforms and in select theaters.https://a24films.com/films/talk-to-me Transcript

item.title: #2052 - Shane Dorian | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Shane Dorian is a former WSL Championship surfer and is now considered by many to be one of the best big wave riders in the world. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Graham Hancock is a researcher, journalist, and author of over a dozen books including “Magicians of the Gods” and “Visionary.” He can be seen on the Netflix series, “Ancient Apocalypse.“www.grahamhancock.com Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe sits down with Dan Henderson, a retired mixed martial artist and olympic wrestler. Check out his new book “Hendo: The American Athlete” now available everywhere. https://dhathleticfitcenter.com/dan-henderson/ Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Ehsan Ahmad is a stand up comedian, writer and host. Look for his podcast called “The Dangerous Brown Podcast” available everywhere. https://www.instagram.com/ehsanjahmad Transcript

item.title: Fight Companion - October 21, 2023 | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by Bryan Callen, and Brendan Schaub, and Eddie Bravo to watch the fights on October 21, 2023.Bryan Callen is an actor, comedian, and podcaster. He’s the co-host of the podcasts “The Fighter and the Kid” and “Conspiracy Social Club,” and host of “The Bryan Callen Show.” www.bryancallen.com Brendan Schaub is stand-up comedian, retired professional mixed martial artist, entrepreneur, and host or co-host of several podcasts and YouTube shows, among them “The Fighter and the Kid,” “The Schaub Show,” “The Golden Hour,” “Calabasas Fight Companion.

item.title: #2049- Coleman Hughes | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Coleman Hughes is a writer and opinion columnist who specialises in issues related to race, public policy, and applied ethics. He’s the host of the “Conversations with Coleman” podcast and author of the “Coleman’s Corner” Substack. www.colemanhughes.org Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Brian C. Muraresku is the author of “The Immortality Key: The Secret History of the Religion with No Name,” now available in a paperback edition featuring new bonus materials.https://www.brianmuraresku.com Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Brian Redban is a comedian, producer, co-host of the podcast and live-streaming YouTube show “Kill Tony,” and founder of the Deathsquad podcast network. https://www.deathsquad.tv/ Transcript

item.title: #2039 - Michael Easter | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Michael Easter is a health and fitness writer, professor, and author of several books. His latest is “Scarcity Brain: Fix Your Craving Mindset & Rewire your Mindset to Thrive with Enough.“https://eastermichael.com Transcript

item.title: JRE MMA Show #146 with Francis Ngannou | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Francis Ngannou is a professional mixed martial artist and boxer currently signed to the Professional Fighters League. Ngannou is scheduled to fight boxer Tyson Fury on October 28. https://francisngannoufoundation.com Transcript

item.title: #2038 - Trae Tha Truth | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Trae Tha Truth is a rapper, record producer, and philanthropist. His new album “Stuck In Motion” will be available October 20. http://onerpm.link/stuckinmotion Transcript

item.title: #2037 - Alex Berenson | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Alex Berenson is a journalist who writes the Unreported Truth Substack (https://alexberenson.substack.com) and the award-winning author of 13 novels and three non-fiction books. He is currently suing the Biden Administration and senior Pfizer officials for their efforts in 2021 to ban him from Twitter; he is the only person ever to be reinstated by Twitter after suing the company over a ban. His most recent book is “Pandemia: How Coronavirus Hysteria Took Over Our Government, Rights, and Lives.

item.title: #2036 - Kurt Angle | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Kurt Angle is an Olympic gold medalist, retired professional wrestler, actor, and host of “The Kurt Angle Show.” Watch his new documentary “Angle” streaming on Peacock. www.kurtanglebrand.com Transcript

item.title: #2035 - Brian Simpson | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Brian Simpson is a stand-up comic who hosts the “Bottom of the Barrel” improvised comedy show at the Comedy Mothership and his own podcast, “BS with Brian Simpson.” Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Jeremy Jones is a professional pool player. He was the 1998 US Open One Pocket champion, the 2003 US Open 9 Ball champion, and has represented Team USA in the Mosconi Cup on seven occasions. Transcript

item.title: #2033 - Matt Rife | The Joe Rogan Experience

His most recent, “Matt Rife:Walking Red Flag,” is available to stream on Youtube. www.mattrifeofficial.com Transcript

item.title: #2029 - Bill Maher | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bill Maher is a comedian, political commentator, the host of HBO’s “Real Time with Maher” and his own podcast, “Club Random.” Catch him in residency at the David Copperfield Theatre at MGM Grand in Las Vegas on September 15 and 16 and November 3 and 4.www.billmaher.com Transcript

item.title: #2028 - Jeremy Corbell & George Knapp | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jeremy Corbell is an investigative filmmaker, UFOlogist, artist, and author. George Knapp is an investigative reporter, weekend host of Coast to Coast AM, and author. http://www.extraordinarybeliefs.com/ http://www.8newsnow.com/author/george-knapp/ Transcript

item.title: #2027 - Oliver Anthony | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Oliver Anthony is a singer/songwriter whose song “Rich Men North of Richmond” recently became a viral phenomenon. He’s the first songwriter to debut at the top of the Billboard Hot 100 with no prior chart history in any form. www.facebook.com/people/Oliver-Anthony-Music/100085643337139/ Transcript

item.title: #2026 - Peter Berg | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Peter Berg is a writer, director, and producer known for “Friday Night Lights,” “Lone Survivor,” “Deepwater Horizon,” and “Patriots Day.” His newest project is the Netflix exclusive limited series “Painkiller.“https://film44.comwww.netflix.com/title/81095069 Transcript

item.title: #2025 - Dave Smith | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dave Smith is a stand-up comedian, libertarian political commentator, and podcaster. He’s the host of the “Part of the Problem” podcast, as well as a co-host of the “Legion of Skanks” podcast. Check out his new stand up special “30 Minutes with Dave Smith” on YouTube. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XGK1SXNMG44www.comicdavesmith.com Transcript

item.title: #2024 - Hulk Hogan | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Hulk Hogan is a professional wrestler, actor, broadcast personality, and entrepreneur whose most recent project is a signature line of cannabis and mushroom products. www.hulkhogan.com www.immortalbyhulkhogan.com Transcript

item.title: #2023 - Brian Keating | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Brian Keating is a cosmologist, professor of physics at UC San Diego, host of the podcast “Into the Impossible with Brian Keating,” and author of several books, including “Losing the Nobel Prize” and “Into the Impossible: Think Like a Nobel Prize Winner.” https://briankeating.com/ Transcript

item.title: JRE MMA Show #145 with Terence Crawford | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joe sits down with Terence Crawford, a three-time World Boxing Organization Champion, two-time lineal champion, and undisputed champion with titles from the World Boxing Association, International Boxing Federation, World Boxing Organization, and World Boxing Council. www.tbudcrawford.com Transcript

item.title: #2022 - Jeremy Gerber, Phil Gerber, & Josh Henning | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Brothers Jeremy and Phil Gerber are co-owners of The Roadster Shop. Josh Henning is its Director of Operations and Business Development. Together, they are the hosts of the Oil & Whiskey podcast. www.roadstershop.com www.youtube.com/@OilandWhiskey Transcript

item.title: #2021 - Mike Baker | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Mike Baker is a former CIA covert operations officer and current CEO of Portman Square Group, a global intelligence firm. He’s also the host of “Black Files Declassified” on Discovery+ and the Science Channel, and author of “Company Rules, Or Everything I Know About Business I Learned from the CIA.” Look for “The President’s Daily Brief” podcast he’s hosting startring on September 5. www.portmansquaregroup.com Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Mike “Python Cowboy” Kimmel is a licensed wildlife trapper of invasive and dangerous species, contracted python hunter, and owner of Martin County Trapping and Wildlife Rescue. www.pythoncowboy.com Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Tim Dillon is a comedian, actor, podcaster, and author. He’s the host of “The Tim Dillon Show” and author of “Death by Boomers: How the Worst Generation Destroyed the Planet, but First a Child,” scheduled for publication on December 5, 2023. www.timdilloncomedy.com Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Post Malone is a rapper, singer, songwriter, and producer. His latest album, “Austin,” is available now. www.postmalone.com Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by Jared Cannonier, a professional mixed martial artist currently fighting in the Middleweight division of the Ultimate Fighting Championship. www.ufc.com/athlete/jared-cannonier Transcript

item.title: #2015 - Zach Bryan | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Zach Bryan is a singer-songwriter and country musician. His most recent releases are the album “American Heartbreak” and the EP “Summertime Blues.” www.zachbryan.com Transcript

item.title: #2014 - Jim Gaffigan | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jim Gaffigan is a stand-up comic, author, and actor. Catch him in his new stand-up special, “Dark Pale,” on Amazon Prime. www.jimgaffigan.com Transcript

item.title: #2013 - Paul Rosolie | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Paul Rosolie is a conservationist, filmmaker, and writer. He’s the founder of Junglekeepers, an organization protecting threatened habitat in western Amazonia, and the author of “Mother of God: An Extraordinary Journey into the Uncharted Tributaries of the Western Amazon.” www.paulrosolie.com Transcript

item.title: #2012 - Gad Saad | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Gad Saad is Professor of Marketing at Concordia University, and an expert in the application of evolutionary psychology in marketing and consumer behavior. He is the host of “The Saad Truth with Dr. Saad” podcast, and the author of “The Saad Truth about Happiness: 8 Secrets for Leading the Good Life.” www.gadsaad.com Transcript

item.title: #2011 - Tony Woods | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tony Woods is a veteran stand-up comic, comedy writer, actor, and an original member of Russell Simmons’ Def Comedy Jam. www.thetonywoods.com Transcript

item.title: #2010 - Marc Andreessen | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Marc Andreessen is an entrepreneur, investor, and software engineer. He is co-creator of the world’s first widely used internet browser, Mosaic, and cofounder and general partner at the venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz www.a16z.com https://pmarca.substack.com Transcript

item.title: #2009 - Duncan Trussell | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Duncan Trussell is a stand-up comic, writer, actor, host of the “Duncan Trussell Family Hour” podcast, and creator of “The Midnight Gospel” on Netflix. www.duncantrussell.com Transcript

item.title: #2008 - Stephen C. Meyer | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Stephen C. Meyer, PhD, is a philosopher of science, the director of the Center for Science and Culture at the Discovery Institute, and the author of several books, including “Darwin’s Doubt: The Explosive Origin of Animal Life and the Case for Intelligent Design,” and “The Return of the God Hypothesis.” Download his free mini-book “Scientific Evidence For A Creator” at www.stephencmeyer.org. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by Sean Strickland, a professional mixed martial artist competing in the middleweight division of the Ultimate Fighting Championship. www.ufc.com/athlete/sean-strickland Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by retired mixed martial artists Matt Serra, Din Thomas & John Rallo. Matt is the co-host of the “UFC Unfiltered” podcast with Jim Norton, and founder and lead instructor of Serra BJJ. Din is the co-host of “After TUF” and host of the “Din’s Got Answers” podcast. John is the owner and head coach at Ground Control mixed martial arts academy in Baltimore. www.serrabjj.com www.ufc.com/athlete/din-thomas https://www.

item.title: #2005 - Tom Segura | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tom Segura is a stand-up comic, actor, podcaster, and author. He co-hosts two podcasts, “Your Mom’s House,” with his wife, comic Christina Pazsitsky, and “Two Bears, One Cave,” with comic Bert Kreischer. He’s also the host of his own podcast, “Tom Segura en Español,” and is the author of “I’d Like to Play Alone, Please: Essays.” His new comedy special, “Tom Segura: Sledgehammer,” premieres July 4 on Netflix. www.

item.title: #2004 - Ice Cube | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ice Cube is a rapper, songwriter, actor, filmmaker, and founder of the 3-on-3, half-court basketball league BIG3. www.icecube.com www.big3.com Transcript

item.title: #2003 - Killer Mike | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Killer Mike is a Grammy-nominated rapper, activist, and entrepreneur. His new album, “Michael,” is available now. www.killermike.com Transcript

item.title: #2002 - Amanda Feilding | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Amanda is an award-winning psychedelics researcher, policy advocate, and artist; advancing psychedelic research for over 50 years. Founder & Director of the Beckley Foundation, a UK-based think-tank and NGO, aiming to further our understanding of consciousness and how changes in cerebral circulation and neuronal activity underlie the effects of various psychoactive substances. Amanda’s work lies at the cutting edge of psychedelic scientific research, she initiated the study which generated the world’s first images of the brain on LSD.

item.title: #2001 - Gabriel Iglesias | The Joe Rogan Experience

item.title: #1791 - Sadhguru | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Sadhguru is a yogi, mystic and visionary. Named one of India’s 50 most influential people, and recipient of 3 presidential awards, Sadhguru has touched the lives of millions worldwide through his transformational programs. An internationally renowned speaker and author of the New York Times bestsellers “Inner Engineering” and “Karma,” Sadhguru has been an influential voice at major global forums like the United Nations and the World Economic Forum, addressing issues as diverse as socioeconomic development, leadership and spirituality.

item.title: #1790 - Nims Purja | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Nims is the multi world record breaking mountaineer who climbed all 14 of the world’s ‘Death Zone’ peaks over 8,000m in just 6 months and 6 days. He was part of the first winter ascent of the ‘Savage Mountain’ K2. His film, “14 Peaks: Nothing Is Impossible,” is out now on Netflix, as is his best-selling book, “Beyond Possible.” Nims is a UNEP Mountain Advocate and founder of the Nimsdai Foundation.

item.title: #1789 - Tom Papa | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Comedian and writer Tom Papa is the host of the popular podcast “Breaking Bread with Tom Papa”, and the co-host, along with Fortune Feimster, of the Netflix radio program “What a Joke with Papa and Fortune.” It can be heard daily on Sirius XM. Transcript

item.title: #1788 - Mr. Beast | The Joe Rogan Experience

item.title: #1787 - Dakota Meyer | The Joe Rogan Experience

item.title: #1786 - Freddie Gibbs & Brian Moses | The Joe Rogan Experience

He’s also the host of “The Osterholm Update: COVID-19” podcast, and author of multiple books, including “Deadliest Enemy: Our War Against Killer Germs.” Transcript

item.title: #1778 - Joey Diaz | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joey Diaz is a stand-up comedian, actor, and host of the podcast “Uncle Joey’s Joint.” Transcript

item.title: #1777 - Andrew Dessler | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Andrew Dessler is a climate scientist and professor of Atmospheric Sciences at Texas A&M University. He served as a Senior Policy Analyst in the White House Office of Science and Technology Policy under President Bill Clinton, and is a Google Science Communication Fellow. Dessler is also the author of several books, among them the award-winning “Introduction to Modern Climate Change.” Transcript

item.title: #1776 - Steven E. Koonin | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Steven E. Koonin is a theoretical physicist, professor, former Chief Scientist for the BP petroleum company, and former Under Secretary for Science at the U.S. Department of Energy under the Obama administration. He’s also the author of “Unsettled: What Climate Science Tells Us, What It Doesn’t, and Why It Matters.” Transcript

item.title: #1775 - Dave Smith | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dave Smith is a stand-up comedian and political commentator. He is also the host of the “Part of the Problem” podcast, and co-host of the “Legion of Skanks” podcast. Transcript

item.title: #1774 - Josh Dubin | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Josh Dubin is a criminal justice reform advocate and civil rights attorney. Transcript

item.title: #1773 - Akaash Singh | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Akaash Singh is a stand-up comedian, podcaster, and actor. You can hear him along with Andrew Schulz on the “Flagrant 2” podcast, and watch his new special, “Bring Back Apu,” available now on YouTube. Transcript

item.title: #1772 - Randall Carlson | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Randall Carlson is a master builder and architectural designer, scholar, and teacher. His podcast, “Kosmographia,” investigates the catastrophic history of the world and evidence for advanced knowledge in earlier cultures. Transcript

item.title: #1771 - Andy Stumpf | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Andy Stumpf is a retired Navy SEAL, record-setting wingsuit pilot, BASE jumper, public speaker, and host of the popular podcast “Cleared Hot.” Transcript

item.title: Hello Friends | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joe’s thoughts Transcript

item.title: JRE MMA Show #118 with Julianna Peña | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joe sits down with UFC Women’s Bantamweight Champion Juliana Peña. Transcript

item.title: #1770 - Valentine Thomas | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Valentine Thomas is a former attorney and financier turned free-diver, spear-fisher, chef, and author. Transcript

item.title: #1769 - Jordan Peterson | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jordan Peterson is a clinical psychologist and the author of several best-selling books, among them “12 Rules for Life: An Antidote to Chaos,” and “Beyond Order: 12 More Rules for Life.” Transcript

item.title: #1768 - Dr. Robert Epstein | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Robert Epstein is an author, professor, and Senior Research Psychologist at American Institute for Behavioral Research and Technology: a non-profit, non-partisan organization that offers data regarding the power of Google and other Big Tech companies to censor dissenting opinions online and sway the outcome of elections. Transcript

item.title: #1767 - James Lindsay | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description James Lindsay is an author, mathematician, podcaster, and founder of New Discourses: an online resource for educating the public on the dangers of the “Critical Social Justice” movement. His latest book, co-authored with Charles Pincourt, is “Counter Wokecraft: A Field Manual for Combatting the Woke in the University and Beyond.” Transcript

item.title: #1766 - Ben Patrick | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ben Patrick, known online as “the Knees Over Toes Guy,” is a coach and owner of ATG: an online personal training program for strengthening knees and developing full body fitness. His new book, “ATG for Life,” is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1765 - Phillip Frankland Lee | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Phillip Frankland Lee is a restaurateur and chef. He is also the co-owner, along with his wife Margarita Kallas-Lee, of Scratch Restaurants Group: the entity behind several popular Los Angeles and Austin restaurants. Transcript

item.title: #1764 - Ari Shaffir, Shane Gillis & Mark Normand | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Shane Gillis, Mark Normand, and Ari Shaffir are standup comedians, writers, and podcasters. Mark is the co-host of “Tuesdays with Stories” along with Joe List. His latest special, “Mark Normand: Out to Lunch,” is available via YouTube. Ari is the host of “The Skeptic Tank.” His most recent special, “Ari Shaffir: Double Negative,” is available via Netflix. Shane is the co-host of “Matt and Shane’s Secret Podcast” with Matt McCusker.

item.title: #1763 - General H.R. McMaster | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description General H.R. McMaster is a retired United States Army lieutenant general who served as the 26th United States National Security Advisor from 2017 to 2018. He is also known for his roles in the Gulf War, Operation Enduring Freedom, and Operation Iraqi Freedom and is currently a senior fellow at the Hoover Institution at Stanford University. His books, “Battlegrounds” and “Dereliction of Duty” are bestsellers. He is host of the podcast “Battlegrounds: International Perspectives” and a regular on the podcast “Goodfellows.

item.title: #1762 - Josh Szeps | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Josh Szeps is a broadcaster who hosts “Afternoons with Josh Szeps” on ABC Radio. His podcast is Uncomfortable Conversations with Josh Szeps. Transcript

item.title: #1761 - Jim Gaffigan | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jim Gaffigan is a standup comedian, author, and actor. His new special, “Comedy Monster,” is now streaming on Netflix. Transcript

item.title: #1760 - Adam Curry | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Adam Curry is an internet entrepreneur, former MTV VJ, and podcasting pioneer. He is the co-host, along with John C. Dvorak, of the “No Agenda” podcast. Transcript

item.title: #1759 - Oliver Stone | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Oliver Stone is a film director, producer, and screenwriter whose credits include “Platoon,” “JFK,” and “Wall Street.” His new documentary, “JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass,” is currently available on SHOWTIME. Transcript

item.title: #1758 - Carrot Top | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Scott “Carrot Top” Thompson is a standup comedian, television personality, and actor currently in residence at the Las Vegas Luxor Hotel and Casino. Transcript

item.title: #1757 - Dr. Robert Malone, MD | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Robert Malone is the inventor of the nine original mRNA vaccine patents, which were originally filed in 1989 (including both the idea of mRNA vaccines and the original proof of principle experiments) and RNA transfection. Dr. Malone, has close to 100 peer-reviewed publications which have been cited over 12,000 times. Since January 2020, Dr. Malone has been leading a large team focused on clinical research design, drug development, computer modeling and mechanisms of action of repurposed drugs for the treatment of COVID-19.

item.title: #1756 - John Abramson | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description John Abramson, MD, is a Harvard Medical School Lecturer, national drug litigation expert, and author. His new book, “Sickening: How Big Pharma Broke American Health Care and How We Can Repair It,” will be available on February 8. Transcript

item.title: #1755 - Tony Woods | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tony Woods is a veteran standup comedian and comedy writer. An original member of Russell Simmons’ Def Comedy Jam, Woods was cited as a major influence by Dave Chappelle. Transcript

item.title: #1754 - Suzanne Santo | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Suzanne Santo is an actress, model, and singer-songwriter. Her latest album, “Yard Sale,” is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1752 - Tim Dillon | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tim Dillon is a stand up comedian and CEO of Fake Business. His podcast “The Tim Dillon Show” is available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1753 - Brian Redban | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Brian Redban is a comedian and the founder of the Deathsquad podcast network. Transcript

item.title: #1751 - Brian Simpson | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Brian Simpson is a standup comedian and host of the podcast “BS with Brian Simpson.” He’s also on Season 3 of The Standups on Netflix premiering on Decemeber 29. Transcript

item.title: #1750 - Ari Shaffir & Tony Hinchcliffe | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ari Shaffir is the host of “The Skeptic Tank.” His most recent special, “Ari Shaffir: Double Negative,” is available via Netflix. Tony Hinchcliffe is a stand-up comedian, writer, and actor. He’s also the co-host, along with Brian Redban, of the podcast and live YouTube show Kill Tony. Transcript

item.title: #1749 - Shane Dorian | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Shane Dorian is a former WSL Championship surfer and is now considered by many to be one of the best big wave riders in the world. He’s also an avid bowhunter and a co-founder of Revelshine: an organic and sustainable wine brand. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe sits down with Marlon “Chito” Vera, an Ecuadorian mixed martial artist currently competing in the bantamweight division of the UFC. Transcript

item.title: #1748 - Beeple | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Mike “Beeple” Winkelmann is a digital artist whose body of work includes concert visuals for Eminem and deadmau5, multiple short films, and an ongoing series of images posted daily to his popular instagram account: Beeple_Crap. Transcript

item.title: #1747 - Dr. Peter A. McCullough | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Peter A. McCullough, MD, MPH, is a board-certified cardiologist who has testified before committees of the US and Texas Senate regarding the treatment of COVID-19 and management of the ongoing pandemic. Transcript

item.title: #1746 - Blaire White | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Blaire White is a YouTuber and political commentator. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe sits down with George Kamobosos Jr., who has held the WBA, IBF, WBO and The Ring lightweight titles since November 2021. Transcript

item.title: #1745 - Matt Taibbi | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Matt Taibbi is a journalist and author. He writes and publishes the TK News newsletter on Substack and co-hosts the podcast “Useful idiots with Matt Taibbi and Katie Halper.” Transcript

item.title: #1744 - Derek from More Plates More Dates | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Derek is the fitness educator and entrepreneur behind the “More Plates, More Dates” YouTube channel, podcast and companion website. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Jimmy Corsetti is the independent researcher behind “Bright Insight”: a YouTube channel exploring ancient mysteries and lost civilizations. Transcript

item.title: #1739 - Philip Goff | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Philip Goff is a philosopher and consciousness researcher at Durham University. His new book, “Galileo’s Error: Foundations for a New Science of Consciousness,” is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1738 - Ben O'Brien | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ben O’Brien is a writer, editor, and member of the Backcountry Hunters and Anglers Board of Directors. Transcript

item.title: #1737 - Tim Pool | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tim Pool is a journalist, political commentator, and host of the “Timcast” podcast and Youtube program. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Ben Shapiro is a political commentator, host of “The Ben Shapiro Show,” and author of “The Authoritarian Moment: How the Left Weaponized America’s Institutions Against Dissent.” Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Theo Von is a standup comedian and podcaster. He is the host of “This Past Weekend with Theo Von” and co-host, along with Brendan Schaub, of “The King and the Sting.” Check out his new special “Regular People” on Netflix. Transcript

item.title: #1730 - Cameron Hanes | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Master bowhunter and elite athlete Cameron Hanes has successfully taken down some of the toughest game in the roughest environments nature has to offer, all in pursuit of becoming “the ultimate predator.” He’s the author of Backcountry Bowhunting: a Guide to the Wildside, and the host of the podcast Keep Hammering with Cameron Hanes. Transcript

item.title: #1729 - Gilbert Gottfried | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Gilbert Gottfried is a standup comedian, actor, author, and host, along with Frank Santopadre, of ”Gilbert Gottfried’s Amazing Colossal Podcast!” available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1728 - Ari Shaffir, Shane Gillis & Mark Normand | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Shane Gillis, Mark Normand, and Ari Shaffir are standup comedians, writers, and podcasters. Shane is the co-host of “Matt and Shane’s Secret Podcast” with Matt McCusker. His special “Shane Gillis: Live in Austin,” is available via YouTube. Mark is the co-host of “Tuesdays with Stories” along with Joe List. His latest special, “Mark Normand: Out to Lunch,” is available via YouTube. Ari is the host of “The Skeptic Tank.

item.title: #1727 - Rob Kearney | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Rob Kearney is the world’s first openly gay professional strongman. He’s also the co-author of the children’s book “Strong,” along with writer Eric Rosswood, and illustrator Nidhi Chanani. Transcript

item.title: #1726 - Chuck Palahniuk | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Chuck Palahniuk is the award-winning author of “Fight Club,” “Choke,” and other books. His new essay, “People, Places, Things: My Human Landmarks,” is available now exclusively through Scribd.com Transcript

item.title: #1725 - Bridget Phetasy | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bridget Phetasy is a writer, stand-up comedian, and host of the YouTube program “Dumpster Fire” and podcast “Walk-Ins Welcome.” Transcript

item.title: #1724 - Jewel | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jewel is a Grammy award-nominated singer-songwriter, author, actress, and philanthropist. Transcript

item.title: JRE MMA Show #115 with Valentina Schevchenko | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by Valentina Shevchenko, the current UFC Women’s Flyweight Champion. Transcript

item.title: #1723 - Amishi Jha | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Amishi Jha is a professor of psychology at the University of Miami, and Director of Contemplative Neuroscience for the Mindfulness Research and Practice Initiative. She is the author of “Peak Mind: Find Your Focus, Own Your Attention, Invest 12 Minutes a Day.” Transcript

item.title: #1722 - Bartow Elmore | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bart Elmore is the associate professor of environmental history and core faculty member of the Sustainability Institute at the Ohio State University. He’s the author of “Seed Money: Monsanto’s Past and Our Food Future.” Transcript

item.title: #1721 - Michael Malice | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Michael Malice is a cultural commentator and host of the PodcastOne podcast “Your Welcome.” He’s the author of two books, “Dear Reader: The Unauthorized Autobiography of Kim Jong Il,” and “The New Right: A Journey to the Fringe of American Politics.” Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Tony Hinchcliffe is a stand-up comedian, writer, and actor. He’s also the co-host, along with Brian Redban, of the podcast and live YouTube show Kill Tony. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Michael Shellenberger is a journalist and author. His latest book, “San Fransicko: Why Progressives Ruin Cities,” will be published on October 12, 2021. Transcript

item.title: #1718 - Dr. Sanjay Gupta | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Sanjay Gupta is a practicing neurosurgeon, chief medical correspondent for CNN, and host of the network’s podcast “Chasing Life.” His new book, “World War C: Lessons from the Covid-19 Pandemic and How to Prepare for the Next One,” is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1717 - Alex Berenson | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Alex Berenson is a journalist and author of both fiction and non-fiction. His latest book, “Pandemia: How Coronavirus Hysteria Took Over Our Government, Rights, and Lives,” will be published on November 30, 2021. Transcript

item.title: #1716 - Steven Rinella | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Steven Rinella is an outdoorsman, writer, and host of the television series “MeatEater” and its companion podcast. His new audiobook, “MeatEater’s Campfire Stories: Close Calls,” is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1715 - Jessica Kirson | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jessica Kirson is a standup comedian, television producer, and host of the “Disgusting Hawk” podcast. “The Call Girls,” a prank call compilation album Kirson recorded with fellow comedian Rachel Feinstein, is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1714 - Josh Dubin & Robert Jones | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Josh Dubin is an Ambassador to The Innocence Project, Criminal justice reform advocate, attorney, and president of Dubin Research and Consulting. On January 26, 2017, Robert Jones was exonerated of four separate crimes, including rape, robbery, kidnapping and manslaughter, which had terrified tourists and residents over a two-month period in 1992 in New Orleans. He is now a motivational speaker and community activist, poverty abolitionist and one of the co-founders of Free-Dem Foundations, Inc; a nonprofit organization that mentors and guides the youth in a positive direction.

item.title: #1713 - Mike Baker | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Mike Baker is a former CIA covert operations officer and current CEO of Portman Square Group, a global intelligence firm. He’s also the host of “Black Files Declassified” on Discovery’s Science Channel. Transcript

item.title: #1712 - Bert Kreischer (Part 2) | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bert Kreischer is a standup comedian, broadcast personality, and podcaster. He hosts television’s “Go-Big Show,” “The Bertcast” podcast, and co-hosts the “2 Bears, 1 Cave” podcast with Tom Segura. (This part 2 of a 2-part podcast.) Transcript

item.title: #1712 - Bert Kreischer (Part 1) | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bert Kreischer is a standup comedian, broadcast personality, and podcaster. He hosts television’s “Go-Big Show,” “The Bertcast” podcast, and co-hosts the “2 Bears, 1 Cave” podcast with Tom Segura. (This part 1 of a 2-part podcast.) Transcript

item.title: #1711 - Patrick Bet-David | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Patrick Bet-David is an entrepreneur, author, and founder of Valuetainment: a multimedia company focusing on business and personal development. He’s also the host of “The Bet-David Podcast.” Transcript

item.title: #1710 - Cullen Hoback | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Cullen Hoback is an investigative filmmaker whose latest doc series “Q: Into The Storm” is now available on HBO Max. He also made “Terms and Conditions May Apply” and “What Lies Upstream”. Transcript

item.title: #1709 - Amanda Knox | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Amanda Knox spent four years in an Italian prison following a wrongful conviction for the murder of her roommate: a sentence that was ultimately overturned by the Italian Supreme Court. She is now an author, journalist, and podcaster. Knox, along with her husband Christopher Robinson, hosts the podcast “Labyrinths.” Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Anna Lembke is a psychiatrist, author and specialist in the treatment of addiction. Her new book, “Dopamine Nation: Finding Balance in the Age of Indulgence,” is available now. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Kyle Dunnigan and Kurt Metzger are standup comedians, actors, and the creators of “Fresh Prez of DC,” a satirical comedy series on YouTube. They are also podcasters. Dunnigan is the host of “The Kyle Dunnigan Show” and Metzger is the host of “Can’t Get Right with Kurt Metzger.” Transcript

item.title: #1706 - Billy Corben | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Billy Corben is a documentarian and producer. His new series, “Cocaine Cowboys: The Kings of Miami,” is now available on Netflix. Transcript

item.title: #1705 - Bret Weinstein & Heather Heying | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Biologists Bret Weinstein and Heather Heying are the hosts of the “DarkHorse Podcast” and authors of “A Hunter-Gatherer’s Guide to the 21st Century: Evolution and the Challenges of Modern Life.” Look for it on September 14, 2021. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description C.K. Chin is the Austin, Texas-based restaurateur behind such popular eateries as Swift’s Attic, Wu Chow Austin, and Native Hostel. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Tom Segura is a stand-up comedian, and co-host of “Your Mom’s House” and “2 Bears, 1 Cave” podcasts. He is also the host of “Tom Segura en Español” a Spanish language podcast. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Laurie Woolever is the author of “Bourdain: The Definitive Oral Biography,” and a co-host of the “Carbface for Radio” Podcast. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Neill Blomkamp is a film director, producer, screenwriter, and animator. His latest film, “Demonic,” is in theaters and video on demand now. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Jimmy Dore is a standup comedian, political commentator, and host of “The Jimmy Dore Show.” Transcript

item.title: #1685 - Shane Gillis | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Shane Gillis is a stand-up comedian, radio personality, and co-host with Matt McKusker of “Matt and Shane’s Secret Podcast.” Also look for “Gilly and Keeves” sketches on YouTube, a new sketch show created by John McKeever and Shane Gillis. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Singer-songwriter Jakob Dylan is the frontman of The Wallflowers. Their new album, “Exit Wounds,” is set for release on July 9. Transcript

item.title: #1679 - Adam Curry | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Adam Curry is an internet entrepreneur, former MTV VJ, and podcasting pioneer. He is the co-host, along with John C. Dvorak, of the “No Agenda” podcast. Transcript

item.title: #1678 - Michael Pollan | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Michael Pollan is an author, professor, and journalist. His newest book, “This is Your Mind on Plants,” is available on July 6. Transcript

item.title: #1677 - Tim Dillon | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tim Dillon is a comedian, tour guide, and host. His podcast “The Tim Dillon Show” is available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1676 - Jesse Griffiths | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jesse Griffiths is a butcher, hunter, author, and restauranteur. He is the co-owner of Dai Due Supper Club and The New School of Traditional Cookery. His new book “The Hog Book: a Chef’s Guide to Hunting, Butchering and Cooking Wild Pigs” is available now only at TheHogBook.com Transcript

item.title: #1675 - Quentin Tarantino | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Quentin Tarantino is a writer, producer, and director. Tarantino’s novelization of his Oscar-winning film “Once Upon a Time…in Hollywood” is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1674 - Clay Newcomb | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Clay Newcomb is a 7th-generation Arkansan that grew up in the Ouachita Mountains. He’s a hunter, mule skinner, curious naturalist, and observer of rural culture. He’s also a writer, filmmaker, owner/publisher of “Bear Hunting Magazine” and host of the hit MeatEater podcast “Bear Grease.” Transcript

item.title: #1673 - Colin Wright | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Colin Wright is a biologist and Managing Editor of “Quillette”, a magazine dedicated to freethought. He is also the founder of “Reality’s Last Stand”, a publication and newsletter exploring the debate around sex and gender. Transcript

item.title: #1672 - Iliza Shlesinger | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Iliza Shlesinger is a comedian, actor, writer, and host of the podcast “Ask Iliza Anything.” Her new film, “Good on Paper”, premieres June 23 on Netflix. Transcript

item.title: #1671 - Bret Weinstein & Dr. Pierre Kory | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Pierre Kory is an ICU and lung specialist who is an expert on the use of the drug ivermectin to treat COVID-19. Bret Weinstein is an evolutionary biologist, visiting fellow at Princeton, host of the DarkHorse podcast, and co-author (with his wife, Heather Heying) of the forthcoming “A Hunter-Gatherer’s Guide to the 21st Century.” Transcript

item.title: JRE MMA Show #112 with Don Frye | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joe sits down with mixed martial artist Don Frye: a UFC Hall of Famer, former pro wrestler, and co-host, along with Dan Severin, of “Dan and Don’s Toxic Masculinity Podcast.” Transcript

item.title: #1670 - David Sinclair | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description David Sinclair is a Harvard researcher who believes aging is a treatable disease. His book Lifespan: Why We Age and Why We Don’t Have To is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1669 - Kyle Kulinski | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Kyle Kulinski is a political activist and commentator, progressive talk radio host, and co-founder of Justice Democrats. He also hosts the show “Secular Talk” and is the co-host of “Krystal Kyle & Friends” available now at https://krystalkyleandfriends.substack.com/ Transcript

item.title: #1668 - Krystal Ball & Saagar Enjeti | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Krystal Ball and Sagaar Enjeti are political commentators and hosts of the YouTube show and podcast “Breaking Points”. Transcript

item.title: #1667 - Annie Lederman | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Annie Lederman is a standup comedian, host of the “Meanspiration” podcast, and look for her new merch at AnnieLederman.com Transcript

item.title: #1666 - Duncan Trussell | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Duncan Trussell is a standup comedian, host of the “Duncan Trussell Family Hour” podcast, and co-creator and star of “The Midnight Gospel” television series. Transcript

item.title: #1665 - Carole Hooven | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Carole Hooven is an evolutionary biologist at Harvard University. Her new book, “T: The Story of Testosterone, the Hormone that Dominates and Divides Us”, will be available July 13. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Josh Dubin is a criminal justice reform advocate, attorney, and Ambassador Advisor to the Innocence Project. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by the legendary jiu jitsu coach and founder of the Danaher Death Squad, John Danaher. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by top ranked jiu jitsu grappler Craig Jones & UFC Feather Champion Alex Volkanovski. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Neil deGrasse Tyson is an astrophysicist, director of the Hayden Planetarium at the Rose Center for Earth and Space in New York City, and host of StarTalk Radio. His newest book, “Cosmic Queries”, is available now. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Steve Adler is lawyer and politician who has been the Mayor of Austin, Texas since 2015. Adler has been a practicing attorney in Austin in the areas of eminent domain and civil rights law for 35 years. Transcript

item.title: #1656 - Adam Duritz | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Adam Duritz is a singer, songwriter, and frontman of the Counting Crows. The band’s first record in seven years, “Butter Miracle, Suite One”, is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1655 - Sebastian Junger | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Sebastian Junger is a bestselling author, journalist, and an Academy Award-nominated documentary filmmaker. His latest book, “Freedom”, is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1654 - Whitney Cummings | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Whitney Cummings is a standup comedian, author, actor, and host of the “Good for You” podcast. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Andy Norman teaches philosophy and directs the Humanism Initiative at Carnegie Mellon University. He is the author of “Mental Immunity: Infectious Ideas, Mind Parasites and the Search for a Better Way to Think,” available now. http://andynorman.org/ Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Anthony Cumia is an on-air personality, host of “The Anthony Cumia Show”, and founder of the Compound Media streaming network. Transcript

item.title: #1651 - Joe List | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joe List is a standup comedian, co-host of the “Tuesdays with Stories” podcast with Mark Normand, and host of his podcast “Joe List’s Mindful Metal Jacket”. Transcript

item.title: #1650 - Russell Peters | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Russell Peters is a standup comedian, actor, and the host of the “Culturally Cancelled” podcast. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Michael Easter was a contributing editor at Men’s Health magazine, columnist for Outside magazine, and is professor at UNLV. He’s the co-host, along with Talib Kweli and Yasiin Bey, of “The Midnight Miracle” podcast, scheduled to release in May. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description David Holthouse is a writer and filmmaker whose investigation into a triple homicide in California’s Emerald Triangle became the subject of the HULU documentary “Sasquatch”. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Christopher Mellon spent nearly twenty years in Washington serving in various intelligence roles, among them Deputy Assistant Secretary of Defense for Intelligence, and Former Minority Staff Director for the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Ethan Suplee is an actor and host of the “American Glutton” podcast. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Gordon Ryan is a submission grappler and mixed martial artist currently signed to ONE Championship. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by Stephen “Wonderboy” Thompson: a mixed martial artist currently competing in the Welterweight division of the UFC. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Colion Noir is a second amendment advocate, attorney, and firearms enthusiast. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by UFC Hall of Famer and actor Georges St-Pierre. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Doug Stanhope is a standup comedian, author, and host of the Doug Stanhope Podcast. Check out his latest audiobook No Encore for the Donkey, available now as an Audible Original. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Marcus Luttrell is a retired Navy SEAL and recipient of the Navy Cross and Purple Heart. He is the author of “Lone Survivor”, the basis for the 2013 film, and host of the Team Never Quit podcast. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Jim Breuer is a standup comedian, actor, and host of the Jim Breuer Podcast. Catch him live on the “Freedom of Laughter” tour. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by mixed martial artist Leon Edwards, who is currently competing in the UFC’s Welterweight division. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Nate Bargatze is a standup comedian and host of the “Nateland” podcast. His new comedy special, “The Greatest Average American”, premieres March 18 on Netflix. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Claressa Shields is a two-time olympic gold medalist and holder of multiple world championship belts. She is the first fighter in boxing history to be an undisputed champion in two different weight divisions in the four-belt era. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by UFC Heavyweight Derrick Lewis. Transcript

item.title: #1618 - Mat Fraser | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Matt Fraser is a retired professional CrossFit athlete. He holds the distinction of being the most decorated competitor in the sport. He is the first and only person to win five CrossFit Games titles, winning the 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, and 2020 CrossFit Games consecutively. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Mike Baker is a former CIA covert operations officer. He is now the president and cofounder of Diligence LLC, a global intelligence and security firm. Mike is also the host of “Black Files Declassified” now available on Discovery+. Transcript

item.title: #1616 - Jamie Metzl | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jamie Metzl is a futurist, author, and founder of OneShared.World. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by Cory Sandhagen, a professional mixed martial artist competing in the UFC’s Bantamweight division. Transcript

item.title: #1615 - Hamilton Morris | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Hamilton Morris is the creator and host of the Vice TV documentary series “Hamilton’s Pharmacopeia,” now in its third season. Transcript

item.title: #1614 - Tiller Russell | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tiller Russell is the director of the new feature film “Silk Road,” and Netflix’s limited documentary series “Night Stalker: The Hunt for a Serial Killer”. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Ayaan Hirsi Ali is a human rights activist and author of the new book “Prey: Immigration, Islam, and the Erosion of Women’s Rights.” Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by former UFC Featherweight Champion Max Holloway. Transcript

item.title: JRE MMA Show #102 with Dustin Poirier | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dustin Poirier is a mixed martial artist, one-time UFC interim lightweight champion, and president of The Good Fight, a nonprofit charitable organization. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by Kevin Holland, a mixed martial artist competing in the UFC middleweight division and his head coach, Travis Lutter, retired mixed martial artist who won The Ultimate Fighter 4. Transcript
