item.description: Podcast Description Brian Moses is a comedian, writer, producer, and co-creator of Roast Battle. Freddie Gibbs is a rapper, founder of the ESGN music label, and 2020 Grammy Award Nominee. Check out “Moses’s Traveling Cocaine Circus” on February 23 at Vulcan Gas Co in Austin, TX. Transcript

item.title: #1610 - Snowpocalypse with Tim Dillon | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tim Dillon is a standup comedian, actor, and host of the Tim Dillon Show. Transcript

item.title: JRE MMA Show #100 with Cody Garbrandt | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Cody Garbrandt is a professional mixed martial artist and former UFC bantamweight champion. He’s also the author of “The Pact”, the story of his rough upbringing in a small Appalachian town. Transcript

item.title: #1609 - Elon Musk | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Elon Musk is a business magnate, designer, and engineer. His portfolio of businesses include Tesla, Inc., SpaceX, Neuralink, and many others. Transcript

item.title: #1608 - Michael Malice | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Michael Malice is a cultural commentator and host of the GaS Digital Network podcast “Your Welcome”. He’s the author of two books, “Dear Reader: The Unauthorized Autobiography of Kim Jong Il”, and “The New Right: A Journey to the Fringe of American Politics”, and co-author of many others. Transcript

item.title: JRE MMA Show #99 with Francis Ngannou | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Francis Ngannou is a professional mixed martial artist competing in the heavyweight division of the UFC. When he’s not busy training for his next fight, he works to empower the youth of his native Cameroon through the Francis Ngannou Foundation. Transcript

item.title: #1607 - Fahim Anwar | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Fahim Anwar is a stand-up comic, actor, and former aerospace engineer. In addition to starring in his own solo comedy special, “There’s No Business Like Show Business” on available on YouTube, Anwar is also a founding member of the sketch comedy group Goatface, and has appeared in several comedy films and tv series. Transcript

item.title: #1606 - Ali Siddiq | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ali Siddiq is a stand-up comic and writer who initially developed his comedic talents during a six-year stint behind bars. Now a successful headliner, Siddiq spends his time offstage volunteering to meet the needs of his Houston, Texas community. His most recent special is “It’s Bigger Than These Bars”, filmed live at Bell County Jail in Texas. Transcript

item.title: #1605 - Mark Smith | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Mark Smith is an airline pilot, mixed martial arts referee, judge, and trainer, and corporate health and wellness advocate. Prior to his career in the private sector, Smith served his country as an Air Force F-16 fighter pilot, with tours at NASA, the White House, and the elite flying group the Thunderbirds. https://www.instagram.com/markdsmithmma Transcript

item.title: #1604 - Jamar Neighbors | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jamar Neighbors is an actor and stand-up comedian. Transcript

item.title: #1603 - Brendan Schaub | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Brendan Schaub is a comedian, actor, and retired mixed martial artist. He is the host of the The Fighter and the Kid and Below the Belt podcasts. Transcript

item.title: #1602 - Justin Wren | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Justin Wren is a professional mixed martial artist, humanitarian aid-worker, and founder of Fight for the Forgotten: a non-profit benefiting the Mbuti Pygmy people of the Congo. Transcript

item.title: #1601 - Brian Redban | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Brian Redban is a comedian, producer, and co-host of the podcast and live-streaming YouTube show Kill Tony, and founder of the Deathsquad podcast network. Transcript

item.title: #1600 - Lex Fridman | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Scientist Lex Fridman researches human-centered artificial intelligence and autonomous vehicles at MIT, and is also the host of the Lex Fridman podcast. Transcript

item.title: #1599 - Tulsi Gabbard | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tulsi Gabbard is a Former United States Representative, presidential candidate, and Iraq War veteran. Currently, she serves as the leader of Tulsi Aloha, a political action committee. Transcript

item.title: #1598 - Mark "The Undertaker" Calaway | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description World Wrestling Entertainment Hall of Famer Mark “The Undertaker” Calaway is a thirty-year veteran of the sports entertainment industry, and widely considered one of the best professional wrestlers of all time. Now retired from the ring, his story is the subject of the wrestling retrospective “Undertaker: The Last Ride”. Transcript

item.title: #1597 - Travis Walton | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Travis Walton’s personal story of alien abduction inspired the science-fiction film “Fire in the Sky”, and has been featured in multiple documentaries devoted to the subject of UFOs. Transcript

item.title: #1596 - Avi Loeb | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Professor Avi Loeb is a theoretical physicist whose areas of professional interest include cosmology and astrophysics. His new book, “Extraterrestrial: The First Sign of Intelligent Life Beyond Earth”, proposes that ‘Oumuamua, the interstellar object that passed through our solar system in 2017, may have been the creation of an alien intelligence. Transcript

item.title: #1595 - Ira Glasser | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ira Glasser is a former director of the American Civil Liberties Union and a lifelong defender of every citizen’s right to free speech. He is the subject of the 2020 documentary “Mighty Ira”, available now on streaming video. Transcript

item.title: #1594 - Yannis Pappas | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Yannis Pappas is a stand-up comedian, actor, and writer. He is the co-host, with Chris Distefano, of the “History Hyenas” podcast, and host of the “Long Days” show on YouTube. Transcript

item.title: #1593 - Dr. Carl Hart | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Professor Carl Hart is an expert in the fields of neuropsychopharmacology and behavioral neuroscience. A longtime champion for evidence-based drug policies, Hart has written a number of influential books in the field. His newest is “Drug Use for Grown-Ups: Chasing Liberty in the Land of Fear”. Transcript

item.title: #1592 - Bryan Fogel | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Filmmaker Bryan Fogel’s “Icarus” won the Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature in 2018. His newest documentary, “The Dissident”, is an investigation of the death of Saudi Arabian “Washington Post” journalist Jamal Khashoggi, murdered at the hands of his own government. “The Dissident” is now available On Demand and in theaters. Transcript

item.title: #1591 - Jordan Burroughs | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Wrestler Jordan Burroughs is an Olympic Gold medalist, four-time World Champion, six-time World Cup champion, three-time Pan American Games Gold medalist and four-time Pan American champion. Transcript

item.title: #1590 - Phil Demers | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Phil Demers is a former professional marine mammal trainer and subject of the new documentary “The Walrus and the Whistleblower”. Transcript

item.title: #1589 - Dr. Mark Gordon & Andrew Marr | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Mark Gordon is an expert in the field of neuroregenerative medicine and the treatment of Traumatic Brain Injuries. SFC Andrew Marr is a Green Beret, co-founder of the Warrior Angels Foundation, and author of “Tales from the Blast Factory”. He is also one of the subjects in the new documentary “Quiet Explosions” available now. Video credit: “Coronavirus Epidemic Update 34: US Cases Surge, Chloroquine & Zinc Treatment Combo, Italy Lockdown” by MedCram - Medical Lectures Explained CLEARLY - https://youtu.

item.title: #1588 - Lawrence Wright | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Lawrence Wright is the Pulitzer Prize-winning author of multiple books including “Going Clear: Scientology, Hollywood & the Prison of Belief”, and “The Looming Tower: Al-Qaeda and the Road to 9/11”. His newest title is “The End of October”, a medical thriller about a doctor’s race to stop a global pandemic. Transcript

item.title: #1587 - Mark Normand | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Mark Normand is a stand-up comedian, actor, and co-host of the Tuesdays with Stories! podcast with Joe List. His latest comedy special, Out to Lunch, is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1586 - Tony Hinchcliffe | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tony Hinchcliffe is a stand-up comedian, writer, and actor. He’s also the co-host, along with Brian Redban, of the podcast and live-streaming YouTube show Kill Tony. Transcript

item.title: #1585 - Michael Kosta | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Standup comedian Michael Kosta can be seen regularly on “The Daily Show with Trevor Noah”, and is the host of the “Tennis Anyone?” podcast. His new Comedy Central special, “Michael Kosta: Detroit. NY. LA.” is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1584 - Todd White | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Todd White is a fourth-degree black belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and an instructor at Jean Jacques Machado Austin. Check out his art at https://www.toddwhite.com/ and @artofwhite on Instagram. Transcript

item.title: #1583 - John Terzian & Craig Susser | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description John Terzian is co-founder and co-president of Los Angeles-based hospitality and lifestyle firm The h.wood Group. Craig Susser is the owner of the Los Angeles restaurant Craig’s, and creator of the non-dairy ice cream brand Craig’s Vegan. Transcript

item.title: #1582 - Alex Berenson | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Alex Berenson is a journalist and award-winning author of both fiction and non-fiction. His newest work, “Unreported Truths about COVID-19 and Lockdowns: Part 1: Introduction and Death Counts and Estimates”, can be downloaded from Amazon and other ebook retailers. Transcript

item.title: #1581 - J. Prince | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description J. Prince is the CEO of Rap-A-Lot Records, author of The Art & Science of Respect, and founder of The Loyalty Collection, a limited collection of fine wines. Transcript

item.title: #1580 - Andrew Schulz | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Standup comedian Andrew Schulz is the star of the four-part Netflix special Schulz Saves America, and co-hosts The Brilliant Idiots podcast with Charlamagne Tha God, and Flagrant 2 with Akaash Singh. Transcript

item.title: #1579 - Suzanne Santo & Gary Clark Jr. | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Singer/songwriter Suzanne Santo is the lead vocalist and co-founder of HoneyHoney, as well as a solo artist who is currently at work on her second album. Gary Clark Jr. is a Grammy award winning singer, songwriter, and guitar player. Transcript

item.title: #1578 - Richard Rawlings | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Richard Rawlings is the star of the Discovery Channel series Fast N’ Loud and Garage Rehab. He’s also the owner of Gas Monkey Garage and Gas Monkey Bar N’ Grill. Transcript

item.title: #1577 - Terry Virts | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Terry W. Virts is a retired astronaut, International Space Station Commander, test pilot, and colonel in the United States Air Force. Virts spent over 213 days in space over the course of his career with NASA. His new book How to Astronaut: An Insider’s Guide to Leaving Planet Earth is now available. Transcript

item.title: #1576 - Mariana van Zeller | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Mariana van Zeller is an award-winning journalist and documentarian. Her latest project is Trafficked: a National Geographic television series that takes her deep into the most dangerous black markets in the world. Transcript

item.title: #1575 - Bill Burr | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bill Burr is a standup comedian, actor, and host of the Monday Morning Podcast. He’s also the voice of Frank Murphy in the Netflix animated sitcom F is for Family, currently in its fourth season. Transcript

item.title: #1574 - Jacques Vallée & James Fox | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jacques Vallée is a venture capitalist, technologist, and world-renowned figure in the field of unidentified aerial phenomena. James Fox is the director of The Phenomenon: a new documentary about UFOs and a global effort to conceal their existence. Transcript

item.title: #1573 - Matthew Yglesias | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Journalist Matthew Yglesias writes about politics and economic policy at Vox.com, a site he co-founded, and also co-hosts The Weeds: a regular podcast devoted to current events. Yglesias is also the author of two books, the most recent of which is One Billion Americans: The Case for Thinking Bigger. Transcript

item.title: #1572 - Moxie Marlinspike | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Computer security researcher Moxie Marlinspike is the creator of the encrypted messenger service Signal, and co-founder of the Signal Foundation: a nonprofit dedicated to global freedom of speech through the development of open-source privacy technology. Transcript

item.title: #1571 - Emily Harrington | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Rock climber and adventurer Emily Harrington is a five-time US National Champion in Sport Climbing. She has scaled some of the world’s most formidable mountains, including Everest, Ama Dablam, and Cho Oyu, and is the first woman to free climb El Capitan via Golden Gate in under 24 hours. Transcript

item.title: #1570 - Willie D & Mike Judge | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Rapper, songwriter, and entrepreneur Willie D is a founding member of the classic hip hop group Geto Boys. In addition to his music career, he has been a candidate for public office, written for a widely-read advice column, and is a former Golden Gloves champion boxer. https://www.youtube.com/c/WillieDLive Mike Judge is a writer, director, actor, and filmmaker. He’s the creator of Beavis & Butthead, co-creator of King of the Hill & also Silicon Valley, and director of movies such as “Office Space” & “Idiocracy.

item.title: #1569 - John Mackey | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description John Mackey is the CEO and co-founder of Whole Foods Market, co-founder of the nonprofit Conscious Capitalism, Inc., and co-author of Conscious Leadership: Elevating Humanity Through Business. Transcript

item.title: #1568 - Tom Green | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tom Green is a comedian, actor, filmmaker, and talk show host. His latest project is The Tom Green Interview: a podcast series featuring weekly conversations with celebrities, newsmakers, and everyday people. Transcript

item.title: #1567 - Donnell Rawlings & Dave Chappelle | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Donnell Rawlings is a stand up comedian, actor, and podcaster. His podcast, The Donnell Rawlings Show, is available on YouTube and most podcast platforms. Dave Chappelle is a stand up comedian and actor. Look for Chappelle’s Show now streaming on Netflix. Transcript

item.title: #1566 - Nicholas Christakis | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Nicholas A. Christakis is the Sterling Professor of Social and Natural Science at Yale University, where he also directs the Human Nature Lab, and serves as Co-Director of the Yale Institute for Network Science. His most recent book is Apollo’s Arrow: The Profound and Enduring Impact of Coronavirus on the Way We Live. https://www.amazon.com/Apollos-Arrow-Profound-Enduring-Coronavirus/dp/0316628212 Transcript

item.title: #1565 - Gary Laderman | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Gary Laderman is a professor of American religious history and cultures At Emory University. He teaches and writes about death and dying, religion and sexuality, and sacred drugs. His most recent book is Don’t Think About Death: A Memoir on Mortality. Transcript

item.title: #1564 - Adam Alter | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Adam Alter is a Professor of Marketing at New York University’s Stern School of Business and the author of two books, Drunk Tank Pink, and Irresistible: The Rise of Addictive Technology and the Business of Keeping Us Hooked. Transcript

item.title: #1563 - Tony Hinchcliffe | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tony Hinchcliffe is a stand-up comedian, writer, and actor. He’s also the co-host, along with Brian Redban, of the podcast and live-streaming YouTube show Kill Tony. Transcript

item.title: #1562 - Dave Smith | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Stand-up comedian, radio personality, and political commentator Dave Smith is the host of the Part of the Problem podcast and a co-host of The Legion of Skanks podcast, both part of the GaS Digital Network. Transcript

item.title: #1561 - Kermit Pattison | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Kermit Pattison is a journalist whose work has appeared in the New York Times, GQ, Fast Company, Runners World, and many other publications. His new book, Fossil Men: The Quest for the Oldest Skeleton and the Origins of Humankind, is available now. https://www.harpercollins.com/products/fossil-men-kermit-pattison?variant=32117911748642 Transcript

item.title: #1560 - Mike Baker | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Mike Baker is a former CIA covert operations officer, host of the Science Channel series Black Files Declassified, and current president and cofounder of Diligence LLC, a global intelligence and security firm. Transcript

item.title: #1559 - Steven Rinella | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Steven Rinella is an outdoorsman, author, and television personality. He currently hosts MeatEater, available on the Sportsman Channel and Netflix, as well as the MeatEater podcast. His new book The MeatEater Guide to Wilderness Skills and Survival is available on December 1. Transcript

item.title: JRE - End Of The World #2 | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tim Dillon is a standup comedian, actor, and host of The Tim Dillon Show. Kyle Kulinski is a political activist, news commentator, and host of The Kyle Kulinski Show. Transcript

item.title: JRE MMA Show #98 with Luke Thomas | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joe sits down with combat sports journalist Luke Thomas, who reports on the latest in boxing and mixed martial arts on the CBS Sports programs Morning Kombat, and Morning Kombat: Dissected. Transcript

item.title: #1558 - Tristan Harris | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Called the “closest thing Silicon Valley has to a conscience,” by The Atlantic magazine, Tristan Harris spent three years as a Google Design Ethicist developing a framework for how technology should “ethically” steer the thoughts and actions of billions of people from screens. He is now co-founder & president of the Center for Humane Technology, whose mission is to reverse ‘human downgrading’ and re-align technology with humanity. Additionally, he is co-host of the Center for Humane Technology’s Your Undivided Attention podcast with co-founder Aza Raskin.

item.title: #1557 - Gad Saad | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Gad Saad is Professor of Marketing at Concordia University, and an expert in the application of evolutionary psychology in marketing and consumer behavior. He’s the author of multiple scientific papers and several books, the most recent of which is The Parasitic Mind: How Infectious Ideas are Killing Common Sense. Transcript

item.title: #1556 - Glenn Greenwald | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Former attorney turned award-winning journalist Glenn Greenwald is a co-founder of online news site The Intercept, and the author of several books, the most recent of which is No Place to Hide: Edward Snowden, the NSA, and the U.S. Surveillance State. Transcript

item.title: #1555 - Alex Jones & Tim Dillon | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tim Dillon is a standup comedian, actor, and host of the Tim Dillon Show. Alex Jones is a filmmaker, writer, and host of the Alex Jones Show. Transcript

item.title: #1554 - Kanye West | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Kanye West is a rapper, record producer, fashion designer, and current independent candidate for office in the 2020 United States Presidential Election. Transcript

item.title: #1553 - Maynard James Keenan | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Maynard James Keenan is a singer, songwriter, producer, winemaker, actor, and martial artist best known as the vocalist for Grammy Award-winning rock band Tool, Puscifer, and A Perfect Circle. Look for “Existential Reckoning”, the new album from Puscifer, on October 30. Transcript

item.title: #1552 - Matthew McConaughey | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Matthew McConaughey is an Academy Award-winning actor known for such films as Dazed and Confused, The Dallas Buyers Club, Interstellar, Free State of Jones, and the HBO television series True Detective. His new memoir Greenlights is now available everywhere and at https://greenlights.com Transcript

item.title: #1551 - Paul Saladino | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Paul Saladino is a physician and board-certified nutrition specialist. He’s a leading expert in the science and practice of the carnivore diet, a food regimen to which Saladino credits numerous health benefits seen in the patients under his care. Transcript

item.title: #1550 - Wesley Hunt | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Wesley Hunt is a candidate for Texas’s 7th Congressional District. A Republican, he is running against Democratic incumbent Lizzie Fletcher. Hunt is a veteran of the Iraq war and former AH-64D Apache Longbow helicopter pilot. When he’s not busy with his family or work, Hunt volunteers his time as a youth mentor and serves on the board of trustees for the Harris County Center for Mental Health. Transcript

item.title: #1549 - Tom Papa | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Comedian and writer Tom Papa is the host of the popular podcast “Breaking Bread with Tom Papa” and the author of two books, the latest of which is “You’re Doing Great! … and Other Reasons to Stay Alive.” In addition, Papa is also the co-host, along with Fortune Feimster, of the Netflix radio program “What a Joke with Papa and Fortune.” It can be heard daily on Sirius XM.

item.title: #1548 - Roy Jones Jr. | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Pro boxer Roy Jones Jr. captured championships in numerous weight divisions, at one time holding a record-breaking seven heavyweight belts simultaneously. In 2003, Jones made history by becoming the first middleweight champion to win a heavyweight title in 106 years. Jones officially retired from the sport in 2017, but signed on earlier this year to fight Mike Tyson in an highly anticipated exhibition bout. Transcript

item.title: #1547 - Colin Quinn | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Comedian Colin Quinn is a veteran of stage and screen, with notable stints as a cast member of “Saturday Night Live”, host of Comedy Central’s “Tough Crowd with Colin Quinn”, and star of multiple one-man shows on and off Broadway. Quinn is also the author of several books, the most recent of which is Overstated: A Coast-to-Coast Roast of the 50 States. Check out his new show “Cop Show” available now on Colin’s YouTube channel: https://bit.

item.title: #1546 - Evan Hafer & Mat Best | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Special Forces combat veterans turned entrepreneurs Mat Best and Evan Hafer are co-founders of Black Rifle Coffee Company: a veteran-owned and operated premium, small-batch coffee roastery. When they’re not busy at BRCC, you can hear them with co-host Jarred “JT” Taylor on the Free Range American podcast. Transcript

item.title: #1545 - W. Keith Campbell | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Social psychologist W. Keith Campbell is a recognized expert on narcissism and its influence on society at large. His latest book, The New Science of Narcissism, explores the origins of this character trait, why its presence has grown to almost epidemic proportions, and how all of us are at least a little narcissistic. Transcript

item.title: #1544 - Tim Dillon | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tim Dillon is a comedian, tour guide, and host. His podcast “The Tim Dillon Show” is available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1543 - Brian Muraresku & Graham Hancock | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Attorney and scholar Brian C. Muraresku is the author of The Immortality Key: The Secret History of the Religion with No Name. Featuring an introduction by Graham Hancock, The Immortality Key is a look into the psychedelic origins of the world’s great spiritual practices and what those might mean for how we view ourselves and the world around us. Hancock’s most recent book is America Before: The Key to Earth’s Lost Civilization, now available in Paperback.

item.title: #1542 - Cameron Hanes | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Master bowhunter and elite athlete Cameron Hanes has successfully taken down some of the toughest game in the roughest environments nature has to offer, all in pursuit of becoming “the ultimate predator.” He’s the author of Backcountry Bowhunting: a Guide to the Wildside, and the host of the podcast Keep Hammering with Cameron Hanes. Transcript

item.title: #1541 - Bridget Phetasy | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Writer, stand-up comedian, and cultural commentator Bridget Phetasy’s writings can be found in The Spectator, Quillette, and The New York Times. In addition, she’s the host of the YouTube program Dumpster Fire, and the podcast Walk-Ins Welcome. Transcript

item.title: #1540 - Frank von Hippel | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Frank A. Von Hippel is an expert in ecotoxicology: the study of how pollutants impact human health and the environment at large. A professor at Northern Arizona University, Von Hippel is the author of The Chemical Age: How Chemists Fought Famine and Disease, Killed Millions, and Changed Our Relationship with the Earth, and the host of The Science History Podcast. Transcript

item.title: #1539 - Jenny Kleeman | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Award-winning documentarian and journalist Jenny Kleeman has reported for HBO’s Vice News Tonight, and BBC’s Unreported World. She is the author of Sex Robots & Vegan Meat: Adventures at the Frontier of Birth, Food, Sex & Death, available now from Pan MacMillan. Transcript

item.title: #1538 - Douglas Murray | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Writer, journalist, and political commentator Douglas Murray is the author of The Madness of Crowds: Gender, Race and Identity, now available in a newly expanded paperback edition from Bloomsbury Publishing. Also look for The Strange Death of Europe available everywhere. Transcript

item.title: #1537 - Lex Fridman | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Scientist Lex Fridman researches human-centered artificial intelligence and autonomous vehicles at MIT, and studies Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu in his spare time. Check out his podcast “Lex Fridman Podcast”, available now on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1536 - Edward Snowden | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Former CIA contractor turned whistleblower Edward Snowden shocked the world when he revealed the misdeeds of the US intelligence community and its allies. Now living in Russia, he is a noted privacy advocate and author who serves as president of the Freedom of the Press Foundation. His book, Permanent Record, is now available in paperback from Henry Holt and Company. Transcript

item.title: #1535 - Tim Kennedy | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Special Forces operator and retired UFC fighter Tim Kennedy is the founder of Sheepdog Response, a training program aimed at giving law enforcement, military, and others the tools they need to quickly and effectively respond to violent threats. Transcript

item.title: Welcome To The Joe Rogan Experience | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description New episodes will be exclusively on Spotify starting December 1st, 2020. Transcript

item.title: #1534 - Ron White | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ron White is a stand up comedian and actor, best known as a charter member of the Blue Collar Comedy Tour. His special “If You Quit Listening, I’ll Shut Up” is now streaming on Netflix. Transcript

item.title: #1533 - Adam Curry | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Adam Curry is a podcaster, announcer, internet entrepreneur and media personality, known for his stint as VJ on MTV and being one of the first celebrities personally to create and administer Web sites. Check out his podcast “No Agenda” with new shows available every Sunday and Thursday on Spotify. http://www.noagendashow.com/ Transcript

item.title: #1532 - Mike Tyson | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Mike Tyson is the former undisputed heavyweight boxing champion of the world. Check out his new podcast called “Hotboxin’ with Mike Tyson” on Spotify. www.TysonOnTriller.com Transcript

item.title: #1531 - Miley Cyrus | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Miley Cyrus is a singer-songwriter, actress, and record producer. http://mileyl.ink/midnightsky Transcript

item.title: #1530 - Duncan Trussell | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Duncan Trussell is a stand-up comedian, and host of his own podcast “The Duncan Trussell Family Hour”. His new show “The Midnight Gospel” is now streaming only on Netflix. Transcript

item.title: #1529 - Whitney Cummings & Annie Lederman | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Whitney Cummings is a stand up comedian, actress, writer, and producer. Check out her new podcast “Good For You” on Spotify. Annie Lederman is a stand up comedian. She is also the host of “MEANSPIRATION” podcast on All Things Comedy. Transcript

item.title: #1528 - Nikki Glaser | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Nikki Glaser is an American stand-up comedian, podcast host, and television host. Look for her podcast “You Up with Nikki Glaser” available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1527 - David Blaine | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description David Blaine is an illusionist, endurance artist, and extreme performer. He is best known for his high-profile feats of endurance and has set and broken several world records. His new special “Ascension” premieres on YouTube live on August 31. Transcript

item.title: #1526 - Ali Macofsky | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ali Macofsky is an actress, writer, and standup comedian. Checkout her podcast “Resting Bitch” available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1525 - Tim Dillon | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tim Dillon is a comedian, tour guide, and host. His podcast “The Tim Dillon Show” is available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1524 - Ron Funches | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ron Funches is a comedian, actor and writer. His podcast “Gettin’ Better” is available on Spotify. On September 5, his live stand up event “Awakening” will be streaming on YouTube and tickets are now available here: eventbrite.com/e/ron-funches-awakening-tickets-113410704470 Transcript

item.title: #1523 - Joey Diaz & Brian Redban | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joey “CoCo” Diaz is a Cuban-American stand up comedian and actor. Joey also hosts his own podcast called “The Church of What’s Happening Now", available on Spotify. Brian Redban is a comedian and the founder of the Deathsquad podcast network. Also look for him on “Kill Tony". Transcript

item.title: #1522 - Rob Lowe | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Rob Lowe is an actor, producer, and director. His new podcast “Literally! with Rob Lowe” is available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1521 - Josh Dubin & Jason Flom | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Josh Dubin is an Innocence Project Ambassador Advisor & President of Dubin Research and Consulting, Inc. He also hosts a podcast called “Wrongful Conviction: Junk Science” available on Spotify. Jason Flom is an Innocence Project Board Member, CEO of Lava Media, and host of the “Wrongful Conviction with Jason Flom”, available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1520 - Dr. Debra Soh | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Debra Soh is a former sex researcher, neuroscientist, columnist, and podcast host. Her new book The End of Gender: Debunking the Myths about Sex and Identity in Our Society is now available. Transcript

item.title: #1519 - Mike Baker | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Mike Baker is a former CIA covert operations officer. Currently he is the president of Diligence LLC, a global intelligence and security firm. His new show “Black Files Declassified” is now available on the Science Channel. Transcript

item.title: #1518 - David Choe | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description David Choe is an American painter, muralist, explorer, adventurer, podcaster, graffiti artist and graphic novelist from Los Angeles, CA. Transcript

item.title: #1517 - Nancy Panza | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Nancy Panza, Ph.D, is a Professor of Psychology at Cal State Fullerton. She has also worked within county, state, and federal facilities providing clinical and forensic services for juvenile and adult offenders and has provided services for police departments in New York City, Alabama, and Southern California. Transcript

item.title: #1516 - Post Malone | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Post Malone is a singer-songwriter, rapper and record producer. Transcript

item.title: #1515 - Dr. Bradley Garrett | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Bradley Garrett is an American social and cultural geographer at University College Dublin in Ireland and a writer for The Guardian newspaper in the United Kingdom. His new book “Bunker: Building for the End Times” is now available. Transcript

item.title: #1514 - Joe De Sena | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joe De Sena is the CEO and founder of “Spartan” and the “Death Race”. He is also a NY Times best selling author of “Spartan Up”, “Spartan Fit” and “The Spartan Way”. Transcript

item.title: #1513 - Andrew Huberman | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Andrew Huberman is a neuroscientist and tenured professor in the Department of Neurobiology at the Stanford University School of Medicine. He has made numerous important contributions to the fields of brain development, brain plasticity, and neural regeneration and repair. Transcript

item.title: #1512 - Ben Shapiro | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ben Shapiro is editor-in-chief of the Daily Wire, syndicated columnist, and host of “The Ben Shapiro Show”, available on Spotify. His new book “How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps” is available now everywhere. Transcript

item.title: #1511 - Oliver Stone | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Oliver Stone is an award-winning director, producer, screenwriter, and author. His memoir “Chasing the Light” is now available. Transcript

item.title: #1510 - George Knapp and Jeremy Corbell | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description George Knapp is an author, speaker, and the chief investigative reporter at KLAS TV in Las Vegas, NV. Jeremy Corbell is a contemporary artist and documentary filmmaker. Transcript

item.title: #1509 - Abigail Shrier | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Abigail Shrier is an author, journalist, and writer for the Wall Street Journal. Her new book “Irreversible Damage: The Transgender Craze Seducing Our Daughters” is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1508 - Peter Schiff | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Peter Schiff is an American businessman, investment broker, author and financial commentator. Schiff is CEO and chief global strategist of Euro Pacific Capital Inc. He also hosts his own podcast called “The Peter Schiff Podcast” available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1507 - Bob Saget | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bob Saget is a stand-up comedian, actor, television host and director. His new podcast is “Bob Saget’s Here For You” is available now on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: Fight Companion - July 11, 2020 | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by Joey Diaz & Tony Hinchcliffe to watch the fights on July 11, 2020. Transcript

item.title: #1506 - James Nestor | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description James Nestor is a journalist who has written for Outside magazine, Men’s Journal, Scientific American, Dwell magazine, National Public Radio, The New York Times, The Atlantic, the San Francisco Chronicle magazine, and others. His new book Breath: The New Science of a Lost Art is available now: https://www.amazon.com/Breath-New-Science-Lost-Art/dp/0735213615 Transcript

item.title: #1505 - Hannibal Buress | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Hannibal Buress is a stand-up comedian, actor, television writer and host. Look for his new special “Miami Nights” available now on YouTube. https://youtu.be/kVc4-05Agf0 Transcript

item.title: #1504 - Alan Levinovitz | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Alan Levinovitz is an author and Associate Professor of Religion at James Madison University. His latest book Natural: How Faith in Nature’s Goodness Leads to Harmful Fads, Unjust Laws, and Flawed Science is available now. Also look for his podcast SHIFT available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1503 - Josh Barnett | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Josh Barnett is a mixed martial artist and professional wrestler who competes in the Heavyweight division of Bellator. Transcript

item.title: #1502 - Russell Peters | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Russell Peters is an actor and stand up comedian. His latest stand up special “Deported” is now available on Amazon Prime. Transcript

item.title: #1501 - James Lindsay | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description James Lindsay is an author, mathematician, and political commentator. His latest book, co-authored with Helen Pluckrose, Cynical Theories: How Activist Scholarship Made Everything about Race, Gender, and Identity―and Why This Harms Everybody will be available on August 25, 2020. Transcript

item.title: #1500 - Barbara Freese | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Barbara Freese is an author, environmental attorney and a former Minnesota assistant attorney general. Her latest book Industrial-Strength Denial is now available: https://www.ucpress.edu/book/9780520296282/industrial-strength-denial Transcript

item.title: #1499 - Aron Snyder | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Aron Snyder is the President at Kifaru international, and also the host of the KifaruCast podcast available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1498 - Jon Stewart | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jon Stewart is a comedian, director, writer, producer, activist, and television host. He’s the director fo the new film “Irresistible” that releases on June 26, 2020. Transcript

item.title: #1497 - Joe Schilling | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joe Schilling is an American Muay Thai kickboxer and MMA fighter who competes in the super middleweight and light heavyweight and the Middleweight division of Bellator MMA. Transcript

item.title: #1496 - Colion Noir | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Colion Noir is a gun rights activist, lawyer, member of the National Rifle Association. Transcript

item.title: #1495 - Kyle Dunnigan | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Kyle Dunnigan is a writer, actor and comedian. Check out his hilarious Instagram page: https://www.instagram.com/kyledunnigan1/ Transcript

item.title: #1494 - Bret Weinstein | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bret Weinstein was a biology professor at Evergreen State College in Olympia, WA. He is now hosting “Bret Weinstein’s Dark Horse Podcast” available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1493 - Steve Schirripa & Michael Imperioli | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Steve Schirripa & Michael Imperioli were co-stars on the HBO show The Sopranos, and are now together hosting a re-watch podcast called “Talking Sopranos” that is available now on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1492 - Jocko Willink | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jocko Willink is a decorated retired Navy SEAL officer, author of the book Extreme Ownership: How U.S. Navy SEALs Lead and Win, and co-founder of Echelon Front, where he is a leadership instructor, speaker, and executive coach. His podcast, The Jocko Podcast, is also available on Spotify. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Tulsi Gabbard is a 2020 Presidential Candidate of the Democratic Party and is currently serving as the U.S. Representative for Hawaii’s 2nd congressional district since 2013. https://www.tulsi2020.com/ Jocko Willink is a decorated retired Navy SEAL officer, author of the book “Extreme Ownership: How U.S. Navy SEALs Lead and Win”, and co-founder of Echelon Front, where he is a leadership instructor, speaker, and executive coach. His new book “Leadership Strategies and Tactics” will be available in January 2020.

item.title: #1390 - Tim Dillon | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tim Dillon is a comedian, tour guide, and host. His podcast “The Tim Dillon Show” is available on Spotify Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Watch James Wilks from The Game Changers debate Chris Kresser on his critiques of the film here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dq4Apc2Xk7Q Chris Kresser, M.S., L.Ac is a globally recognized leader in the fields of ancestral health, Paleo nutrition, and functional and integrative medicine. Link to notes from this podcast by Chris Kresser: http://kresser.co/gamechangers Transcript

item.title: #1387 - Josh Homme | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Josh Homme is a singer, songwriter, musician, record producer, and actor. He is the founder and primary songwriter of the rock band Queens of the Stone Age. Transcript

item.title: #1388 - Louie Psihoyos | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Louis Psihoyos is a photographer and documentary film director known for his still photography and contributions to National Geographic. His film “The Cove” won the Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature in 2010. Transcript

item.title: #1386 - Matt Taibbi | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Matt Taibbi is a journalist and author. He has reported on politics, media, finance, and sports, and has authored several books including his latest “Hate, Inc.: Why Today’s Media Makes Us Despise One Another” is available now & look for his podcast “Useful Idiots” is available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1385 - Paul Stamets | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Paul Stamets is a mycologist, author and advocate of bioremediation and medicinal fungi. Check out http://www.fungi.com/ Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Ari Shaffir is a stand-up comedian and also hosts the podcasts “Ari Shaffir’s Skeptic Tank” & “Punch Drunk Sports" both available on Spotify. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Malcolm Gladwell is a journalist, author, and public speaker. He is the host of the popular podcast “Revisionist History” and his new book “Talking to Strangers: What We Should Know about the People We Don’t Know” is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1381 - Donnell Rawlings | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Donnell Rawlings is a stand up comedian, actor, and podcaster. He’s known best for his roles on Chappelle’s Show and The Wire. Look for his new podcast “The Donnell Rawlings Show” coming soon. Transcript

item.title: #1382 - RZA & Donnell Rawlings | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description RZA is a rapper, record producer, musician, actor, and director. He is the de facto leader of the Wu-Tang Clan. Donnell Rawlings is a stand up comedian, actor, and podcaster. He’s known best for his roles on Chappelle’s Show and The Wire. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe sits down with UFC Middleweight Champion, Israel “The Last Stylebender” Adesanya. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Greg Fitzsimmons is a writer and stand-up comedian. He also hosts a podcast with Alison Rosen called “Childish" available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1377 - Rick Baker | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Rick Baker is a retired special make-up effects creator and actor, mostly known for his creature effects and designs. He won the Academy Award for Best Makeup seven times from a record of eleven nominations. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Artie Lange is a stand-up comedian and actor, best known for his tenures on The Howard Stern Show and the sketch comedy series Mad TV. Recorded at GaS Digital Studios in NYC Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Edward Norton is an actor, writer, producer, director, and filmmaker. His new film “Motherless Brooklyn” opens in theaters on November 1. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Kyle Kulinski is a political activist, progressive talk radio host, social democratic political commentator, and the co-founder of Justice Democrats. He also hosts the show “Secular Talk”. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Andrew Santino is a stand up comedian and actor. Check out his podcast “Whiskey Ginger" available on Spotify. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Kevin Smith is a filmmaker, actor, comedian, public speaker, comic book writer, author, and podcaster. Look for his movie “Jay and Silent Bob Reboot” on tour now with tickets available at https://rebootroadshow.com/ Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe sits down with Dave Leduc, the current openweight Lethwei World Champion and current WLC Cruiserweight World Champion. Transcript

item.title: #1370 - Brian Grazer | The Joe Rogan Experience

item.title: #1368 - Edward Snowden | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Edward Snowden is an American whistleblower who copied and leaked highly classified information from the National Security Agency in 2013 when he was a Central Intelligence Agency employee and subcontractor. His new book “Permanent Record” is now available. Transcript

item.title: #1369 - Christopher Ryan | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Christopher Ryan, PhD is a psychologist, speaker, and author of New York Times best seller “Sex At Dawn” and he also hosts a podcast called “Tangentially Speaking" available on Spotify. item.description: Podcast Description Bridget Phetasy is a writer and comedian. Check out her show on YouTube called “Dumpster Fire” – https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5SQnm72FspDNUXK4cB2_xg%C2%A0& and her podcast called “Walk-Ins Welcome” available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1366 - Richard Dawkins | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Richard Dawkins, FRS FRSL is an English ethologist, evolutionary biologist, and author. He is an emeritus fellow of New College, Oxford, and was the University of Oxford’s Professor for Public Understanding of Science from 1995 until 2008. His latest book “Outgrowing God: A Beginner’s Guide” is available now. Transcript

item.title: #1365 - Cameron Hanes | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Cameron Hanes is a bowhunting athlete, “training intensively each and every day to become the Ultimate Predator” and he also has a podcast called “Keep Hammering with Cameron Hanes.” Transcript

item.title: #1362 - Lenny Clarke | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Lenny Clarke is a legendary Boston comic and actor. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe sits down with former boxer Evander Holyfield, who was the undisputed champion at cruiserweight in the late 1980s and at heavyweight in the early 1990s, and remains the only boxer in history to win the undisputed championship in two weight classes. item.description: Podcast Description Nikki Glaser is a stand-up comedian, podcast host, and television host. Her new stand-up special “Bangin” is now streaming on Netflix. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description The Black Keys is a rock band formed in Akron, Ohio, in 2001. The group consists of Dan Auerbach and Patrick Carney. Their latest album “Let’s Rock” is available now everywhere. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by mind coach and fight commentator Vinny Shoreman & 8 time kickboxing and Muay Thai world champion, including holding the W.M.C. belt, Liam Harrison. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Rob Zombie is a musician and filmmaker. His new film “3 From Hell” is available in select theaters this week and everywhere in October. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Sean Carroll is a cosmologist and physics professor specializing in dark energy and general relativity. His new book “Something Deeply Hidden” is now available and also look for “Sean Carroll’s Mindscape" podcast available on Spotify. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Nick Bostrom is a Swedish philosopher at the University of Oxford known for his work on existential risk, the anthropic principle, human enhancement ethics, superintelligence risks, and the reversal test. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description David Sinclair, Ph.D., A.O. is a Professor in the Department of Genetics and co-Director of the Paul F. Glenn Center for the Biology of Aging at Harvard Medical School. His new book “Lifespan: Why We Age And Why We Don’t Have To” is now available. Transcript

item.title: #1348 - Bill Burr | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bill Burr is a standup comedian and also hosts his own podcast called “Monday Morning Podcast” available on Spotify. His new special “Paper Tiger” is now streaming on Netflix. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Neil deGrasse Tyson is an astrophysicist, cosmologist, author, and science communicator. Transcript

item.title: #1344 - Joseph LeDoux | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joseph LeDoux is a neuroscientist whose research is primarily focused on survival circuits, including their impacts on emotions such as fear and anxiety. His latest book “The Deep History of Ourselves: The Four-Billion-Year Story of How We Got Conscious Brains” is now available. Transcript

item.title: #1345 - Steve Aoki | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Steve Aoki is a musician, author, DJ, record producer and music executive. His new book called “Blue: The Color of Noise” is available now. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Zuby is an independent rapper, creative entrepreneur, speaker and podcast host. Check out his podcast called “Real Talk with Zuby” available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #1342 - John Carmack | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description John Carmack is a computer programmer, video game developer and engineer. item.description: Podcast Description Steven Rinella is an outdoorsman, author, and television host. He currently hosts “MeatEater” on the Sportsman Channel & Netflix, and a podcast also called “MeatEater" available on Spotify. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description John Nores has served as a game warden with the California Dept. of Fish and Wildlife. There he co-developed the Marijuana Enforcement Team (MET) and Delta Team, the CDFW’s first comprehensive wilderness spec ops tactical and sniper unit, aimed at combatting the marijuana cartel’s decimation of California’s wildlife resources. Transcript

item.title: #808 - Michael Wood, Jr. | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Michael A. Wood, Jr. is a retired Baltimore police officer and veteran of the USMC. He previously made the news for publicly speaking out against police brutality and has become a proponent of a new era of policing. A young man who met Michael as a child, when Michael was a cop volunteering a recreation center, found Michael to talk about how much the experience affected him as well.

item.title: #598 - Joey "CoCo" Diaz | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joey “CoCo” Diaz is a Cuban-American stand up comedian and actor. Joey also hosts his own podcast called “The Church of What’s Happening Now”, available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #597 - Magnus Walker & Alex Ross | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Magnus Walker is a driver, a famous collector and builder of Porsches. He’s in a short documentary called “Urban Outlaw” featuring his cars and his obsession with Porsches. Alex Ross is the owner, and co-founder of Sharkwerks, which creates dialed-in, tweaked-out modern Porsches for Porsche enthusiasts. Transcript

item.title: #596 - Brian Stann | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Brian Stann is a retired mixed martial artist and U.S. Marine, who competed as a Middleweight in the UFC. He is a former WEC Light Heavyweight Champion and is currently an analyst & commentator for the UFC. Transcript

item.title: #595 - Nick DiPaolo | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Nick DiPaolo is a writer and stand up comedian. His latest special “Another Senseless Killing” is available now at http://www.nickdipaolo.com. Transcript

item.title: #593 - Josh Fox | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Josh Fox is a film director and environmental activist, best known for his Oscar-nominated documentary, Gasland & Gasland II. Transcript

item.title: #592 - Bert Kreischer | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bert Kreischer is a stand-up comedian, actor and reality television host. Check out his new book “Life of the Party” on Amazon and his podcast “Bertcast” available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #591 - Kevin Pereira | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Kevin Pereira is a game show host, TV personality, and podcast creator. Check out the “Pointless Podcast” available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #590 - Ana Kasparian | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ana Kasparian is a producer and co-host of “The Young Turks” and also teaches journalism at Cal State Northridge. Transcript

item.title: #588 - Philip DeFranco | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Philip DeFranco is a popular YouTube and internet personality. He hosts “The Philip DeFranco Show” where news stories are discussed every Monday-Thursday at youtube.com/sxephil Transcript

item.title: #589 - Chris Harris | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Chris Harris is an automotive enthusiast. He “writes and does low-rent videos about cars”. Transcript

item.title: #587 - Ron Finley | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ron Finely is a “guerrilla gardener” from South Central, LA. After giving his first TED Talk in 2012, Ron has been spreading his “vision for community gardening and rejuvenation” all over the world. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe is joined by Eddie Bravo, Brendan Schaub & Bryan Callen to watch a few old fights and also discuss some other topics. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Kill Tony is a podcast on the Deathsquad.tv network. A show created by Tony Hinchcliffe and Redban, where young comedians do 1-minute of stand up to be judged by weekly guests. Every episode also features two regulars doing a brand new minute each week, Kimberly Congdon and Sara Weinshenk. Transcript

item.title: #585 - John Heffron | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description John Heffron is a stand-up comedian and a past winner of “Last Comic Standing” on NBC. Transcript

item.title: #584 - Zoltan Istvan | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Zoltan Istvan is a futurist, philosopher, journalist, author of #1 best-selling novel “The Transhumanist Wager” & 2016 US Presidential candidate for the Transhumanist Party. Transcript

item.title: #583 - Bill Burr | The Joe Rogan Experience

item.description: Podcast Description Andreas Antonopoulos is a bitcoin entrepreneur, he also serves on the advisory boards of several bitcoin startups and serves as the Chief Security Officer of Blockchain. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Unbox Therapy is a YouTube channel “where products get naked.” Lewis does in-depth reviews of new tech products releasing to the consumer market. http://www.youtube.com/unboxtherapy Transcript

item.title: #579 - Rory MacDonald | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Rory MacDonald is a Canadian mixed martial artist currently signed with the UFC fighting in the Welterweight division. He is a former King of the Cage Lightweight Champion. Transcript

item.title: #578 - Peter McGraw | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Peter McGraw is an associate professor of Marketing and Psychology at the University of Colorado at Boulder. Along with journalist Joel Warner, they are responsible for “The Humor Code” - a bestselling book, blog & international research project. His research spans the fields of judgment and decision making, emotion, affect, and mood. Transcript

item.title: #577 - Duncan Trussell | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Duncan Trussell is a stand-up comedian, and host of his own podcast “The Duncan Trussell Family Hour” available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #576 - Jim Shockey | The Joe Rogan Experience

item.title: #575 - Matt Fulchiron | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Matt Fulchiron is a stand-up comedian and also hosts his own podcast called “The Full Charge Power Hour” available on Spotify. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Mark Gordon is the Medical Director of Education at Access Medical Laboratory and is recognized as a top leader world wide in Interventional Endocrinology (Anti Aging Medicine). Jason Hall is a screenwriter, his new movie “American Sniper” stars Bradley Cooper and is directed by Clint Eastwood releases this winter. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Dom Irrera is a stand up comedian, and also hosts his own podcast called “Dom Irrera Live from The Laugh Factory.” Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Joe Perry is a guitar player, singer, songwriter, and co-founder of Aerosmith. Transcript

item.title: #566 - Sue Aikens | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Sue Aikens is a woman living in Kavik, 197 miles North of the Arctic Circle in extreme isolation. Her motto is “If it hurts, don’t think about it.” Check out on the new season of “Life Below Zero” on NatGeo November 4th. Transcript

item.title: #564 - Sturgill Simpson | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Sturgill Simpson is an American country music singer-songwriter. He has released two albums independently, “High Top Mountain” & “Metamodern Sounds in Country Music” available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #563 - David Choe | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description David Choe is an American painter, muralist, graffiti artist and graphic novelist from Los Angeles, CA. Check out his podcast at DVDASA.com Transcript

item.title: #561 - Bruce Damer | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Bruce Damer is a polymath scientist, designer, author and general explorer of liminal realms. He has worked for over a decade in simulation and design of space missions for NASA, develops biochemical models for the origin of life at UC Santa Cruz and collects vintage computers and their history in his DigiBarn computer museum. He has a practice exploring beyond the edges of consciousness to bring back stuff that is meaningful for humanity and the Gaian prerogative.

item.description: Podcast Description Honey Honey is a band, featuring members Suzanne Santo and Ben Jaffe, from Los Angeles, CA. They are currently recording a new album and can be seen touring all over the world. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Bobcat Goldthwait is a stand-up comedian, actor, screenwriter, and director. Transcript

item.title: #365 - Kelly Starrett, Glen Cordoza | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Kelly Starrett is a coach, physical therapist, author, speaker, and creator of MobilityWOD. His new book written with Glen Cordoza is called Becoming a Supple Leopard. Transcript

item.title: #364 - Tom Rhodes | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tom Rhodes is an American stand-up comedian, actor, and TV host. Currently he hosts his own podcast available on Spotify called “Tom Rhodes Radio”. Transcript

item.title: #363 - Everlast | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Everlast is an American singer-songwriter known for hits such as “What It’s Like” and “Put Your Lights On” and was a founding member of House of Pain. Transcript

item.title: #362 - Eddie Ifft | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Eddie Ifft is an American stand-up comedian and also hosts his own podcast called Talkin’ Shit with Eddie Ifft. Transcript

item.title: #360 - Graham Hancock | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Graham Hancock is an English author and journalist, well known for books such as “Fingerprints Of The Gods” and “Entangled” Transcript

item.title: #359 - Alex Grey | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Alex Grey is an American artist that specializes in psychedelic art, a self-described “mystic artist.” Transcript

item.title: #357 - Daniele Bolelli | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Daniele Bolelli is an Italian author, professor, and martial artist. His books include “Create Your Own Religion” and “On the Warrior’s Path” and his podcast is called “The Drunken Taoist.” Transcript

item.title: #356 - Dan Hardy | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dan Hardy is an English mixed martial arts fighter, who has fought previously in the UFC, as well as for Cage Force and Cage Warriors. Transcript

item.title: #355 - Dom Irrera | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dom Irrera is a stand up comedian, and also hosts his own podcast called “Dom Irrera Live from The Laugh Factory”. Transcript

item.title: #353 - Brian Redban | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Brian Redban is a stand-up comedian, and also runs the Deathsquad podcast network available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #352 - Tom Segura | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joe sits down with Tom Segura. Special appearances by Bert Kreischer & Joey “CoCo” Diaz. Transcript

item.title: #351 - Georges St. Pierre | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Georges St. Pierre is a Canadian MMA fighter, and is also the UFC Welterweight Champion. Transcript

item.title: #350 - Tony Hinchcliffe | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tony Hinchcliffe is an American stand-up comedian. Tony also is a writer on the tv show The Burn with Jeff Ross. Transcript

item.title: #348 - Steven Rinella, Bryan Callen, Cam Edwards | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Steven Rinella is an outdoorsman, author, and television host. He currently hosts “MeatEater” on the Sportsman Channel. Bryan Callen is an actor, stand-up comedian, and host of his own podcasts: “The Bryan Callen Show” and “the Ten Minute Podcast”, with co-hosts Will Sasso and Chris D’Elia. Cam Edwards is the host of “Cam and Company” on the Sportsman Channel. Transcript

item.title: #347 - Joey Diaz | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joey “CoCo” Diaz is a Cuban-American stand up comedian and actor. Joey also hosts his own podcast called “The Church of What’s Happening Now” available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #346 - Douglas Rushkoff | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Douglas Rushkoff is an American media theorist, writer, columnist, lecturer, graphic novelist and documentarian. He is best known for his advocacy of open source solutions to social problems, and also has written many books on topics including society, media, and technology. Rushkoff also had the first syndicated column in the New York Times on cyberculture. Transcript

item.title: #345 - Bryan Callen | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bryan Callen is an actor, stand-up comedian, and host of his own podcasts: The Bryan Callen Show and The 10-Minute Podcast, with co-hosts Will Sasso and Chris D’Elia. Transcript

item.title: #343 - Bill Burr | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bill Burr is an American standup comedian and also hosts his own podcast called “Monday Morning Podcast”, available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #342 - Christopher Ryan | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Christopher Ryan, PhD is a psychologist, speaker, and author of New York Times bestseller Sex At Dawn. Transcript

item.title: #341 - Ben Hoffman | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ben Hoffman is a comedian and writer, currently starring in his own show on Comedy Central called The Ben Show. Transcript

item.title: #339 - Jacob Ward | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jacob Ward is the editor of Popular Science magazine. Transcript

item.title: #338 - Shane Smith | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Shane Smith is a Canadian-American journalist. He also is the co-founder and CEO of the international media company VICE. Transcript

item.title: #336 - Scott Sigler | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Scott Sigler is an American author known for science fiction and horror books, such as Nocturnal, Ancestor, Infected and Contagious. Before being published, Scott built an online audience by giving away his self-recorded audiobooks for free as podcasts. Transcript

item.title: #337 - Justin Wren | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Justin Wren is an American MMA fighter, formerly on the Ultimate Fighter. He is currently on a 1-year mission helping the Pygmy people of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Learn more about his project here: FightFortheForgotten.com Transcript

item.title: #335 - Bas Rutten | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bas Rutten is a retired MMA fighter and former UFC Heavyweight Champion. He currently is the co-host of Inside MMA, and also runs Elite MMA gym in Thousand Oaks, CA. Transcript

item.title: #334 - Dr. Amit Goswami | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Amit Goswami, Ph. D. is a retired professor from the theoretical physics department of the University of Oregon in Eugene. He has authored numerous books on the ideas and concepts surrounding quantum physics, including “Quantum Mechanics”, “God is Not Dead”, and “The Self-Aware Universe”. Transcript

item.title: #333 - David Lee Roth | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description David Lee Roth is the lead singer of multi-platnium hard rock band from Southern California, Van Halen. Roth also has spent time on the radio, as an actor, and was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2007. He currently hosts the The Roth Show. Transcript

item.title: #332 - Tom Segura | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Tom Segura is a stand-up comedian, and hosts his own podcast with his wife, Christina Pazsitzky called Your Mom’s House. Transcript

item.title: #330 - Eddie Huang | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Eddie Huang is a food personality, former TED fellow, and the owner of Baohaus in NYC’s Lower East Side. Eddie also wrote a book called “Fresh Off The Boat”, and stars in his own VICE series of the same name. Transcript

item.title: #329 - Duncan Trussell | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Duncan Trussell is a stand-up comedian, and host of his own podcast, The Duncan Trussell Family Hour. Transcript

item.title: #328 - Dan Carlin | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dan Carlin is an amateur historian and former radio talk show host. He now hosts two popular podcasts available on Spotify: “Common Sense” and “Hardcore History”. Transcript

item.title: #327 - Dana White | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Dana White is a businessman, entrepreneur, and the president of the UFC. Transcript

item.title: #326 - Bryan Callen | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Bryan Callen is an actor, stand-up comedian, and host of his own podcasts: The Bryan Callen Show and The 10-Minute Podcast, with co-hosts Will Sasso and Chris D’Elia. Transcript

item.title: #325 - James Thompson | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description James “Colossus” Thompson is a mixed martial artist from England. He has previously fought in Dream, Pride, the SFL. Transcript

item.title: #323 - Rick Ross | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description “Freeway” Rick Ross is a community activist, formerly known for his incarceration after being convicted as the kingpin of the “drug empire” of 1980’s Los Angeles. Transcript

item.title: #322 - Ari Shaffir | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Ari Shaffir is a stand-up comedian and host of his own podcasts, “Ari Shaffir’s Skeptic Tank” and “Punch Drunk Sports”, both available on Spotify. Transcript

item.title: #321 - Melissa Etheridge | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Joe sits down with Melissa Etheridge. Transcript

item.title: #319 - Alex Honnold | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Alex Honnold is a big wall free solo climber. As one of the best in the world, Alex has attained a number of speed records and also has been featured on programs such as 60 Minutes and Nat’l Geographic. Search for “Alex Honnold” on YouTube and prepare to blown away by a skill that few in the world have. Transcript

item.title: #318 - Aubrey Marcus, Eddie Brill | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Aubrey Marcus is writer, entrepreneur, and adventurer. Some of his writings and experiences can be found on his website, WarriorPoet.us, as well as links to his latest venture, Onnit Labs. Transcript

item.title: #316 - Enson Inoue, Chuck Liddell | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Enson Inoue is a Japanese-American mixed martial artist. He currently runs multiple training gyms throughout the world, and more recently traveled to northeast Japan to directly help the earthquake and tsunami victims in areas such as Fukushima. Chuck Lidell is an American mixed martial artist, and former UFC Light Heavyweight Champion. Transcript

item.title: #317 - David Choe, Yoshi Obayashi | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description David Choe is an American painter, muralist, graffiti artist and graphic novelist from Los Angeles, CA. To learn more about him and his work check out the documentary “Dirty Hands: The Art and Crimes of David Choe” and also on his VICE series “Thumbs UP!” Yoshi Obayashi is a stand-up comedian and host of his own podcast, Yoshi Didn’t. Transcript

item.title: #315 - Jimmy Smith | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Jimmy Smith is a former American MMA fighter, and is currently a commentator for Bellator Fighting Championship. Transcript

item.title: #313 - Gregg "Opie" Hughes | The Joe Rogan Experience
item.description: Podcast Description Gregg “Opie” Hughes is a co-host of the popular talk-radio program The Opie & Anthony Show, which airs on Sirius/XM Satellite Radio. Transcript
